source: Joe loved to eat dirt. He would make mud pies every chance he got. He was eating a pie when he felt something very hard in his mouth. Joe had bitten down on a rock and knocked out his tooth.
target: Joe decided not to eat dirt again.

source: Rob has never been on a rollercoaster. Rob's friends offered him a free ticket to six flags. Rob decided he may as well join. They all went and waited a long line.
target: Rob had generous friends.

source: Carly was waiting for Sam to call her. He promised to on Friday. It was now late Saturday and she hadn't heard anything. Finally she decided to call him.
target: Sam answered the phone.

source: Amy came home from school on her birthday to an empty house. She was upset that everyone had forgotten her special day. She walked sadly into the living room. Suddenly, her friends and family jumped out from their hiding spots.
target: Amy grinned with delight.

source: Pan tried to hit me for no apparent reason. As mad I was, I simply defended her punch. She continued to throw her fist at me. In efforts to stop her, I threw her on the ground.
target: Pan finally stopped.

source: Becky has a cousin named Ashley. Becky and Ashley used to be friends when they were kids. Ashley started being stupid when she grew up. She went to jail for stealing tampons from a dollar store.
target: Becky lost contact with her.

source: Pam and Tom's baby was a light sleeper. Their thoughtless neighbor often left his dog outside barking all day. Every time Pam got her baby to sleep, the dog started barking. Pam fantasized about unleashing the dog so it would run away.
target: One night, Pam decided to release the dogs.

source: May was accepted to college in Fredonia. She took the bus to her new school. She explored the campus. She loved everything she saw.
target: She even liked all of her professors.

source: Mary needed to have teeth pulled. She wanted the dentist to put her to sleep. All he could do was numb the area with Novocaine. Mary stared at him in horror.
target: After seeing her expression, the dentist was able help Mary.

source: Ford was proud of his high GPA. He worked every evening on assignments in order to improve it. Ford's friends warned him that he was missing out on fun. Later in life, Ford became a successful lawyer.
target: Ford was proud of his accomplishments.

source: My wife says I lack passion. That I don't have many hobbies or interests. I tried to argue but couldn't. I realized she was right.
target: I decided to change.

source: Nina wanted a nice Halloween costume. But she could not afford anything fancy. She looked through her house for ideas. Then she found a great costume for free.
target: Nina was excited.

source: Veronika liked hiking in the woods. One day she was on a trail and found a tree house. She climbed the ladder and was amazed at all the stuff in the house. It was fully furnished with a furniture and blankets.
target: Veronika decides to visit the tree house more often.

source: It was a beautiful spring day in early March. Tracey decided to go for a walk in the woods behind her house. She was heard a woodpecker and began looking for it in the trees. She tripped over a root and fell on the path.
target: Tracey shrugged off her fall.

source: Bob was really thirsty and wanted a soda. Unfortunately, he didn't have any money. Bob walked into a gas station and asked if he could have a soda. The cashier asked him if he had any money.
target: He said no and left the gas station.

source: Jim was waiting at the airport. His wife would be there in an hour. He was very bored. He then decided to catch up on his book.
target: Jim saw his wife after an hour.

source: Joe really wanted to attend Columbia University. He worked really hard in school, was on the soccer team. He got put on the waiting list. Although he was disappointed, he tried his best to the very end.
target: Joe was still very proud of his hard work.

source: Gina's friend Tami had a folder she didn't want anyone else to have. Gina wanted one but didn't know where to buy one. Now Tami had a new Lisa Frank Trapper Keeper. Gina was jealous since she wanted one too.
target: Gina checked on ebay and found one she could afford.

source: Leah had a beautiful Christmas tree in her house. One day, she left to go to the store. When she returned, the tree was knocked over. Her cat had climbed it and pulled it down!
target: Leah chastised her cat.

source: Peter had used the same chair for Years. It was becoming worn out. He decided to buy a new, more comfortable chair. When it arrived Peter was very happy.
target: Peter thought it might even be more comfortable than the old one.

source: Rex is getting ready for a party tonight. He realizes he hasn't prepared anything for guests to eat with cheese. Rex runs out to get a baguette. He slices it into thin even slices to make it easy to eat.
target: Everyone enjoyed the cheese and bread.

source: Ali always takes the train to get to work each day. One day she was very sick but still went to work. She worked hard all day and even took work home. She got on the train and fell asleep.
target: She missed her stop and had to take a bus home.

source: The football team had worked hard all season. They had won every game and made it to the championship. There were only seconds left on the clock and the game was tied. The quarterback through a long pass and the receiver scored.
target: The crowd all stood up in their seats and applauded wildly.

source: We live in a high rise building. One day the wind was strong, partly due to the height of the building. The wind blew the tree branches so much my wife could not sleep. The wind also knocked down the internet cable.
target: My wife and I were very unhappy to lose our internet connection.

source: Kate wanted to buy a new keyboard for her computer. She saved up for months to afford a good keyboard. Kate finally went online and ordered her keyboard! She waited excitedly for days for its arrival.
target: Then  her keyboard arrived in the mail.

source: Jon graduated from college and began his job search. He applied for jobs in his field every day. Three weeks after he began, he got a call. The person calling asked if he would be interested in an interview.
target: Jon accepted.

source: Julie loved to read anything she could get her hands on. Most of her time was spent in the library. Her favorite library was staffed by Miss Watson. Miss Watson saw Julie's love of books and offered her a job.
target: Julie happily accepted!

source: Amy's family was going to Six Flags. She sat patiently in the car waiting to arrive. When the arrived she sat on her knees surveying the park. She waited in line for an hour to ride the largest roller coaster.
target: Amy was really excited to be at the park.

source: Steve was in a hurry to get to the football game. On the highway, Steve drove his car very fast. The highway patrol stopped Steve's car. The officer wrote Steve a ticket for speeding.
target: Steve was upset.

source: My daughter went to her first birthday party for a friend. She was so excited leading up to the party. She talked of nothing else for a week. She went to the party and had a blast.
target: When she came home she fell asleep immediately, exhausted.

source: Bob needed money to buy food. He was sad that he couldn't eat because he had no money. He decided to write a book about his hard life. People immediately praised the book and bought thousands of copies!
target: The profits from the book sales gave Bob enough money to eat.

source: I just completed my first marathon today. It was about six miles and I worked real hard. I trained for it for about three months. It's always been on my to do list in life
target: I've never been happier.

source: Bobby folded his fruit roll-up into the shape of an airplane. He wound up his arm and threw roll-up airplane as hard as he could. It was far too heavy, though, and fell like a brick. Bobby decided that planes should be made out of paper.
target: Bobby was five years old.

source: Sam was stargazing one night. Suddenly he sat bolt upright. He saw a twinkling, moving star! He ran to show it to his dad.
target: His dad laughed because the star was really a jet with lights.

source: John and Meg had dated for five Year's. John loved Meg, and wanted to marry her. He decided to ask her to marry him tonight, after a movie date. When they walked out of the movies, he suddenly dropped to his knees.
target: He asked her to marry him.

source: A beautiful bunch of bananas dangled just out of reach. Bobby tried throwing his shoe, but it got stuck. He tried climbing the tree, but he fell. Next, he whacked furiously with a hoe, but it was too short to reach.
target: Bobby went into the shed to get a ladder to get the bananas.

source: Beth was recovering from an illness. She was finally able to eat food after 4 days. Although she was better she wasn't well. She decided to take Friday off from school and take time to heal.
target: Beth needed to rest.

source: Rhonda bought some new pink socks to wear. She loved them. When she took them off, though, they got mixed in with other laundry. On laundry day she washed her clothes without sorting them.
target: Sadly, they were ruined and Rhonda had to buy a new pair.

source: The sea was frightening during a storm. Marcus hated the way the boat rose up and crashed down. It made him sick to his stomach. He cowered in his cabin and shut his eyes but it didn't help.
target: Marcus then vomited from sea sickness.

source: Yesterday, Anna decided to take a nap. She got comfortable in her chair and closed her eyes. Just as she fell asleep, her daughter's puppy jumped into her lap! She was very surprised.
target: She cuddled with the adorable puppy, happy to see it.

source: Chuck loves this bar by his house. He goes there all the time with friends. He was on his way there one day and noticed it was closed. It had been put out of business.
target: Chuck was upset.

source: Steve was sitting in the cafe. While at the cafe, he usually read a book. However, today he forgot his book. He had no choice but to do a lot of thinking.
target: While thinking, Steve came up with an idea for a novel.

source: John was driving to the store when he realized he forgot his wallet. His driver's license was in the wallet. Police lights started flashing behind him. After pulling over he told the officer he forgot his wallet at home.
target: The officer was understanding.

source: Tom enjoyed puzzles growing up. He was not just outside of the escape room adventure. He calmed his breathing and readied himself mentally. Thirty minutes later, he exited the escape room in record time.
target: He felt pride in his accomplishment.

source: Gina was bored while cleaning her room. But it had to be done. She decided to turn on the radio. There was a song she never heard before.
target: She enjoyed the song.

source: A small snowstorm came through a town. The school roof buckled under the weight. A janitor climbed on top to inspect. The roof shook under the new weight.
target: The janitor was frightened.

source: My birthday was yesterday. To my surprise my friends planned a party for me. I could not believe it. The party was very fun.
target: It was the best birthday party ever.

source: My mother threw out her old dictionary. I retrieved it from the trash. Sitting with it, I found myself smelling it. It reminded me of the scent of an old library.
target: It was gross.

source: Our parents took us to Paragon Park in 1963. We took a ferry from Rowes Wharf in Boston. We rode the carousel, the whip, and the caterpillar. We played skeeball.
target: We have many fond memories of this childhood trip.

source: My favorite movie is the Wizard of Oz. I used to think it was real when I was young. Whenever I watched it, I felt immersed in the movie. The characters took me away into the Land of Oz.
target: One day, I decided to buy the movie.

source: Mary Ann went for a walk on a trail at the park. She passed people with children and animals. She passed people jogging and riding bikes. She saw a lot of plants.
target: Mary Ann got a rash from one of them because it was poison ivy.

source: One day, a dog moved into a family that had two cats. One cat didn't mind the new dog, but the other cat was scared. He meowed loudly and scratched the dog's nose. He leaped from one side of the room to the other to escape the dog.
target: The dog found him and mauled him.

source: My favorite animal is the Arabian Oryx. I can't usually see them because it's an African antelope. I have to go to zoos. My family bought me a nice present for my birthday this year.
target: They gave me a big illustrated book on African animals.

source: Everyday, I nag my daughter to do her homework. I finally decided that it is her own responsibility. Sure enough, she didn't do it one evening. I sent her to bed anyway, knowing she would get in trouble at school.
target: She ended up making a bad grade on the assignment.

source: A young boy wanted to pitch for his baseball team. He practiced a lot with his brothers. At practice his coach let him try out as pitcher. The boy did not do well.
target: The young boy went home disappointed.

source: Sue woke up in the middle of the night to an awful smell. She could not figure out what it was. She looked around the room. Then she noticed saw it.
target: Sarah found spoiled milk on her desk.

source: Mark notices that his teeth are beginning to hurt one day. He decides to visit his dentist to see what is the matter. The dentist tells Mark that he needs to have his wisdom teeth removed. Mark agrees to have the surgery done.
target: Mark hoped the procedure would stop his dental pain.

source: Lulu had just moved into her new home. She had a dishwasher for the first time. She decided to run a load of dishes that night. In the compartment, she poured some dish soap.
target: Lulu turned on the dishwasher.

source: Farmer Bill called out the the cows in the field. The came running in for their food. Bill poured out some grains for the cows in big bins. The cows happily ate their dinner.
target: Bill was proud of his work.

source: Terry left the hospital frustrated and disheartened. He had trouble opening his car door with a broken thumb. At home, he asked his sister to loan him money for surgery. She agreed on the condition that he get a job with insurance.
target: He agreed,

source: Mary has worked at a car dealership for two Year's without selling. Her boss tells her that she needs to sell a car soon. One day a couple comes into the dealership and asks to see a car. Mary sells them a very big, expensive car.
target: Mary's boss is happy with her sale.

source: Brie and her cat moved in with her boyfriend and his cat. The two cats hated each other. They spent most of their hissing each other. One night, six months later, the cats decided to cuddle.
target: Brie was glad they had become friends.

source: Tim needed a new kitchen floor. His was old and cracked. So he went shopping for new tiles. He found great tiles and brought them home.
target: He installed a beautiful new kitchen floor for his home.

source: Dave decided one day he wanted to go see a nickelback show. He ordered a few tickets. He then invited some of his friends. They all went to the show, and had a good time
target: Dave checks the internet for more concerts the he will like.

source: There is a cemetery with 199 grave stones. 12 men brought a casket. 12 men put the casket in the ground. Men and women wept together.
target: They mourned for losses.

source: Joe felt confident going into his boxing match. He dominated the first four rounds. He got hit with a left hook that cut his eye in the fifth. The last seven rounds were a back and forth affair.
target: Joe eventually won the fight.

source: The nastiest thing happened to Jimmy. He picked up a bag of potato chips from his bedroom floor. On his way out the door, he ate some chips. Outside, his friend said, why are there ants crawling on your bag?
target: Jimmy felt sick to his stomach.

source: My son participated in a cub scout toy car derby. Father and son teams designed small matchbox cars. Some teams designed fancy cars. We designed a simple car, which actually won the derby.
target: My son was happy that we won.

source: Brian tried out for the hockey team this year. Unfortunately he did not make the team. The coach said that he needed to be faster on skates. Brian spent all winter working on his speed skating.
target: He eventually made the team.

source: Kelly was skiing when suddenly she heard a large commotion behind her. She looked back and saw a wall of snow coming towards her. She panicked and started skiing faster down the slope. As the avalanche caught up to her she quickly jumped into some trees.
target: Kelly grabbed a tree and hung on tight.

source: Harry really wanted to see the new Star Wars movie. He waited in line at the box office on opening day. He was able to buy a ticket for himself. He watched the entire movie.
target: Harry really liked the movie.

source: Mark was starting a new job the next day. He was nervous about being around so many strangers. He barely slept any the night before due to anxiety. When he entered the building he was greeted warmly by many people.
target: He realized he would fit in perfectly at the new job.

source: Ellen had a baby daughter who slept in a crib in her own room. One morning Ellen did not hear her baby fussing, so she went to check. Her daughter was not moving or breathing! Ellen called the police in a terrible panic.
target: Ellen was horribly afraid.

source: Pearl collected CDs with ugly cover art. She prized a jazz CD with two dolphins photoshopped together. Her sister stole the CD while angry with her. Pearl's heart sank and she implored her sister to return it.
target: Pearl's sister was seeking revenge.

source: Anna went to the beach. The tide drew out, and she saw a tide pool. She went to inspect it, and she was amazed at all the life in it. There were fish, sea urchins, starfish - it was incredible!
target: Anna watched the sea life and thought about the wonder of nature.

source: Brianna complained bitterly when her family went camping. It would ruin her hair and nails and there was no tv. However, she forgot these things when she tasted her first S'MORE. Munching her treat, she gazed at the huge, starry sky in awe.
target: Brianna loved s'mores.

source: Shay was hiking in the woods. Then she realized she was lost! She tried not to panic. She retraced her steps until she found her way back to camp.
target: Shay felt overwhelming relief.

source: Troy was the best player on his basketball team. His team was playing in the championship game tonight. Troy scored 56 points to win the game for his team. He carried a huge trophy after the game.
target: The next morning he found he'd made the front page of the paper.

source: Simon got food poisoning. He thought back on all the restaurants he's recently visited. He called his friends who ate with him on these occasions. One of his friends informed him he was also sick with food poisoning.
target: They figured out which restaurant it was.

source: Arnold was scared of birds. One day he was at a picnic. A bird was flying in the distance. It landed on his food.
target: Arnold screamed in terror!

source: One day Adam bought two BB guns. He gave one to his son, Christian. Christian wanted to play with the guns in the house. Christian shot the gun and broke the screen on the television.
target: Adam took the gun away from Christian.

source: Kip was disappointed there wasn't any snow. He whined to his parents that it just wasn't Christmas without it. They told him to go to bed. Kip stomped his way to his room and eventually fell asleep.
target: Kip dreamed of snowflakes.

source: Ben has always wanted to learn how to play piano. Now that his children are grown up, he has more spare time. Ben enrolls in a piano class with a local tutor. Although it is difficult, he is dedicated to learning.
target: He gets better with every lesson.

source: Benson was bullied at school by another boy. Benson began losing sleep about it. He finally told his teachers at school about it. The teachers approached the bully about the problem.
target: The bully was expelled.

source: My father and I were making space for plants in the backyard. We dug for several minutes trying to make room. I found a box that was buried in the ground. When I looked inside, there was a dead animal.
target: I put the box back and found another place to dig.

source: Karen had gone away for school, leaving behind her partner Sam. Sam was missing Karen, but he had a plan to fix that. On a long weekend, Sam took the train upstate to go visit Karen. Karen who was missing Sam, had a plan to fix it as well.
target: She traveled home to see Sam, and they missed each other!

source: Joey was camping with his friends. He wanted to start a fire to roast marshmallows. He found some sticks and logs in the woods. He used a match to light the logs.
target: Then he roasted marshmallows.

source: Diana cleans offices buildings for a living. She washes toilets and scrubs floors. On Friday she was really sick and nauseous at work. She couldn't take the day off.
target: She threw up in the toilet.

source: Jason's best friend is getting married in India next year. Jason decides that he wants to learn Hindi before the wedding. He hires a tutor and practices speaking Hindi every day. When the wedding day arrives, Jason is fluent in Hindi!
target: Everyone was impressed that Jason had become bilingual.

source: Todd and Ashley were dating. Todd got irritated with Ashley. He gave her the silent treatment. Ashley got upset.
target: She decided not to speak to Todd either.

source: My friends and I got invited to a party at college. We got all dressed up for the exciting event. We were all so excited to have fun! At the party, we danced the whole time.
target: We had a great time!

source: Kelly and her friends decided to have a baking party. The girls decided to bake some cookies. They baked chocolate and oatmeal cookies. After they were done they wrapped them in bags.
target: They handed them around to all the neighbors.

source: Girls are a lot of trouble. Sometimes they say things they do not mean. Last one I talked to lied to me. She told me she was rich.
target: She ended up being very poor.

source: It was a very cold day. The snow was coming down very hard for many hours. The people of Lansing were stuck in their homes without power. The storm brought three feet of snow to the city.
target: School was cancelled.

source: Larry was playing golf with his father. Larry was feeling really energetic from his coffee earlier. He hit the ball as hard as he could on his first swing. Larry got a hole in one!
target: Larry was excited  to have scored his first hole in one.

source: Candy woke up excited because it was her birthday. But the whole day went by and no one gave her any gifts. She began to feel depressed and thought everyone had forgotten. Later, she got hungry and headed for the kitchen, but stopped.
target: She didn't want to binge eat out of depression.

source: Recently, I became very unhappy with my job. I decided to look around for a new one so I would be happy. I applied to many different places. One place called me back and I went for an interview.
target: I went to the interview and was happy to get the job.

source: Lindsey really wanted a new pair of shoes. The shoes were very expensive. She decided to save up her money. After several weeks, she could get the shoes.
target: She bought and enjoyed the shoes.

source: Ora had been dared not to shower in order to join a sorority. She couldn't imagine going without clean water for a week! Then she thought of a loophole. They hadn't said Ora couldn't take a bath!
target: Ora took a bath.

source: On Allison's 25th birthday her family took her to bingo. She had never played before and was nervous. After they showed her how to play she was excited to begin. On the fourth game she got a bingo.
target: Allison plans to pay bingo again in the future.

source: Nya wanted to see the parade downtown. She caught three buses. Then she took the subway. She made it downtown just in time.
target: Nya was excited to be able to watch the parade.

source: Madeline was thrilled to get a new purse at Saks. Her mother took her to the bag department. Madeline immediately saw a pink bag she loved. She could not believe how amazing it was.
target: Madeline's mother happily bought the bag for her.

source: Tom bought a new plant. He kept it by his bed. The plant stopped growing. His mother said it needed sunlight.
target: So Tom moved the plant to a window.

source: Yu Darvish is a pitcher for the Texas Rangers. For the last two seasons he has been injured. According to reports, he is finally healthy and able to play. Ranger fans are hopeful he will be a leader for their pitchers.
target: Ranger fans are looking forward to his return.

source: Avery received a homework assignment due in two weeks. She immediately read through the task. She made a schedule and broke it up into tasks for each day. She completed the tasks on their scheduled day.
target: Avery finished her project early.

source: Chester decides to go to the mall one afternoon. He does not intend on buying anything, but just wants to walk around. However, he sees a very nice shirt on sale. Chester buys the shirt because the price is so good.
target: Chester was very pleased with the shirt he bought.

source: Gina realized she needed to get to work on her report. She had wasted the whole day and only had one left to complete it. She sat down and began to work. Her mother wanted her to wash the dishes.
target: Gina wished she hadn't wasted her day.

source: Tuesdays are laundry days at my apartment. We have been too busy the last couple of Tuesdays. Now we have almost no clean clothes left. I'm dressed foolishly and still smell bad.
target: I will do laundry right now.

source: It was a beautiful summer day outside. Bob decided to go for a walk at the park. Bob walked along the path and admired the scenery. He found a twenty dollar bill on the ground.
target: He was happy.

source: Meghan and Scott wanted to see their favorite band play in a concert. Tickets went on sale online and the server was very busy. Meghan and Scott were trying hard to buy tickets. Just when the concert was almost sold out, Meghan found two tickets.
target: They were so relieved.

source: John had just graduated high school, and was about to go to college. His mom helped him pack all his stuff, and he drove away. When he got there, he went to check out his dorm. His new roommate was there, and they hit it off.
target: They walked around campus and got invited to a party.

source: Jackie had been a long distance runner for many Year's. Despite her very full iPod, she became bored with music. One of her running friends recommended an audible book. She loaded a new release to her iPod.
target: She listened to a book while she ran.

source: Ari's friends dared her to spend the night in the local haunted house. Ari tentatively agreed. She climbed in through the house's window. Then she snuggled up with her blanket in the corner.
target: She lasted the whole night.

source: Sam drove around with his high beams on. One of his headlights was out and he thought it was safer. He was pulled over last night. The cop gave him a ticket and told him to fix it.
target: Sam was unhappy.

source: One night, a group of friends decided to play with a Ouija board. It was all in fun, and they played for an hour. After playing, they laid down for bed. Minutes later, they heard a strange banging sound on the floor.
target: They all freaked out naturally.

source: Jan was tired of winter and cold weather. She saw a commercial advertising a car that would be great for a trip. She bought the car and planned the trip on a map. She drove all over the state of Florida.
target: By the time she got home it had become warmer due to spring.

source: Neil had just arrived in Iran. He was enthralled with the cities and countryside. He thought the mountains were so beautiful. The language and people were wonderful too.
target: He was happy to be in Iran.

source: Andrew had been single for many Year's. While he wanted a girlfriend he did not know how to approach anyone. Finally a friend introduced Andrew to a nice young lady. Andrew asked her out on a date.
target: The girl said yes to Andrew.

source: Amy was running late for her flight. She hurried through airport security. She could hear her name over the speaker near her gate. She ran top speed and greeted annoyed stewardess.
target: She boarded her flight just in time.

source: Ana was tanning on the beach. She dozed off in the warm sun. She woke three hours later. Her eyes widened as she looked in the mirror.
target: Ana was extremely sunburnt.

source: Paul felt brave so he tried to join the Army. The Army said he was too weak to join. Paul was undeterred so he then tried to join the Navy. The Navy refused him because Paul couldn't swim.
target: Paul was very frustrated.

source: The cat chased the mouse across the empty warehouse. Running in fear, the rodent moved as fast as it could. The larger feline stayed close behind. It was terrified.
target: The mouse got away.

source: Neil flew into Russia. There, he visited tourist sites and saw friendly locals. He found that Russia was colorful and vibrant. It also had a great and rich history.
target: Neil found the trip stimulating.

source: Mary makes candles. She enjoys this as a hobby. Mary took one to her friend as a gift. Everyone loved the candles and asked to buy one.
target: Mary was very happy.

source: It was summer and Gina and her sister were bored. They decided to watch music videos. There was the music video channel or the black entertainment channel. They chose to watch the black entertainment channel.
target: Gina and her sister had a great time together.

source: I was really excited I was going to the beach. I made sure to pack everything up in my car. I drove there and put on my swim trunks. When I came out of the dressing room, it started to rain.
target: My plans were ruined, and I went home.

source: Arnold was scared of cats. He thinks all of them are creepy. One day he visited his girlfriend's house. His girlfriend has a cat.
target: Arnold dumped his girlfriend.

source: Leah is a full time college student who wants a part time job. Leah searches craigslist and finds an entry level position. Leah applies and the next day get a call for an interview. Leah goes to the interview and does really well.
target: Leah gets the job.

source: Yesterday I went to toys r us. I had to get gifts for my cousins. I loaded my cart up. Thankfully I found out they had a sale.
target: Because I'm a cheapskate it suited me well.

source: Bob was driving from Texas to Florida. He refused to stop at hotels for a break. After fifteen hours of driving, he was tired. He began to fall asleep.
target: Bob decided to stay at a nearby hotel for the night.

source: I got my concert tickets. I drove to Chicago. I could not believe I was seeing a Beatle. I was 30 rows from the front of the stage.
target: I cheered when the Beatle came under the spotlight.

source: Maggie noticed a bat was flying around her ceiling. She panicked and didn't know what to do. She decided to hide in her room and call the exterminator. Suddenly, her cat comes in her room holding something in his mouth.
target: It was the bat.

source: It was summer. And Jeff's room was very hot. He saw dark blinds advertised to block heat. And he thought it would make a noticeable difference.
target: Joe was pleased when he put up the new blinds.

source: Joey's uncle showed him a marble. He teased Joey and said it was his glass eye. Later, Joey played marbles with friends. One boy said his marble was a cat's eye.
target: Joey knew everybody was just teasing him.

source: Around 11am, the school's fire alarm went off. Rushing towards the door, the students stopped when gunshots rang out. Then the teacher instructed them to hide under their desks. Diving under their desks, the students were petrified.
target: They waited until the incident was over.

source: Jeffries's remote ran out of batteries. It stopped working completely. He needed to replace them. So he went to the store to buy some more.
target: He made sure to buy rechargeable batteries this time.

source: I've always wanted to be able to bike thirty miles at one time. Right now I can only bike about twenty miles at once. I got myself a biking trainer who helped me make progress. I worked hard for a few months and ate all the right foods.
target: Now I can bike 30 miles.

source: My family has always loved camping, me not so much. The summer I was 19 was the last time I camped. First our car broke down and we were stranded in the heat for hours. I burned my hand cooking dinner, fell in the lake and eaten by bugs.
target: I decided never to go camping again.

source: My professor assigned my class an essay. By the time I left the classroom, I had forgotten about it. A few days later, my classmate messaged me to ask if I had done it. I was so upset because I had totally forgotten!
target: I was worried about my grade.

source: Sally believes her boss is trying to fire her. She stays late to make sure her work is correct. Sally is still on edge. She decides to set up a meeting with her boss.
target: Sally hopes her boss will keep her.

source: We decided we would learn to make candy. We checked out a book on the subject and read up. Then, we set to work trying. We realized greatly overestimated how hard it was to make candy.
target: We found we made a mess in the kitchen.

source: Will was very wild in kindergarten, and did not listen to his teacher. His father was very upset with him. He pointed to the school janitor, and told Will that was his future. Will did not want to clean up the school bathrooms.
target: Will started to listen to his teacher.

source: Emily was very nervous to get her shots at the doctor's office. She hid under the table and cried. When the nurse gave her the shot, Emily reached out and hit her. Both Emily and the nurse were surprised and in pain.
target: Emily was reprimanded by her parents.

source: My friends and I were playing outside. We wanted to play a new game. We decided to play street hockey since we weren't familiar with it. We went outside and got out gear.
target: We enthusiastically played the game till it got dark.

source: One day, my computer mouse stopped working. I went to the store to buy a new one. Every mouse I found was too expensive. I went home and decided to try and fix my mouse.
target: I was successful.

source: Samantha was driving to class. She noticed that she forgot her textbook at home. She drove back home in order to get it. She arrived in class 25 minutes late.
target: I was better for her to be late than to be unprepared.

source: It was my first time skiing and I was not doing well. I skied directly in the path of another skier. We collided and both fell to the ground. The other skier told me his name was Jack and it was nice to meet me.
target: I thought Jack was very polite.

source: Gabe needed a desk in his room. But he didn't have a lot of money. He found plywood in his garage. So he made a desk out of it.
target: He polished the wood after he built the desk.

source: Rick told his friends that he hated camping. They bugged him until he went camping anyway. One night, he awoke to a snake in his tent. He ran screaming from the tent.
target: Rick refuses to even think about going camping now.

source: Jerry wanted to start a new career. He searched the classified ads for job postings. He found a desirable posting in one of the ads. He emailed his resume to the recruiter.
target: Then recruiter set up an interview for Jerry.

source: Emile wanted to be a great chef. He took lessons and worked hard learning how to cook. He practiced his cooking and served food for friends. His friends loved his cooking and encouraged him.
target: Emile eventually got a job as a chef.

source: Ella had packed a picnic for her family. But she had forgotten to bring forks! They had no way to eat their chicken and watermelon. Then they all started to laugh and eat with their hands.
target: Ella was happy that the picnic wasn't ruined.

source: Emily woke up early to get ready for school last Monday. Before she got dressed, she checked to see if school was canceled. It had snowed so much that school was cancelled. Emily was happy and decided to stay inside and read on her day off.
target: She finished her latest book.

source: Joline went to the nail salon to get a manicure. The nail technician cleaned and trimmed her nails. Joline could not decide what color nail polish she would like. The nail technician suggested a design that used multiple colors.
target: Joline decide to take the technician's advice.

source: Harry secretly hated haunted houses, but couldn't let his friend down. Faking a brave face, the went forth into the darkened house. He managed to make it all way through without screaming out loud. At the very end, they fell through a trick floor into a bunch of goo.
target: Harry wished he wouldn't have went.

source: Bobby wanted to be a wrestler. He took wrestling in high school. Then he joined a team in college. Soon he was wrestling professionally.
target: He retired early due to injury.

source: Joan decided to treat herself to a fancy sushi dinner. But the food was bad and the waiter was even worse! She asked for the manager but he never bothered to come. Although it was unlike her, Joan got so mad she left without paying.
target: Joan felt bad about the dinner but glad she was assertive.

source: Jesse had always wanted to get a tattoo. Her parents were very against the idea of tattoos. One her 18th birthday she decided to get one. She got a small tiara tattoo on her shoulder.
target: Jesse's parents were upset with her.

source: Juliette wanted to be a scientist when she grew up. She decided she must perform an experiment. She emptied a box of baking soda into a pan. Then she poured in vinegar.
target: Juliette built a volcano.

source: Jaclyn came over to hang out with Robs girlfriend. Jaclyn and Rob do not get along. Rob tried very nice to keep the peace and be nice. Jaclyn kept saying very snide comments and remarks
target: Rob finally left to hang out with his friends.

source: Sharon and her sister drove to the grocery store to pick up eggs. They were going to have dinner guests and were baking a cake. On the way into the house Sharon tripped and fell. The eggs flew out of her hands and landed on the concrete.
target: Sharon broke all of the eggs.

source: There once was a slave trader. He found god and changed his wicked ways. He wrote a song about his conversion. That song became famous and popular.
target: The slave trader became very famous and rich from his song.

source: Ella went out sledding one afternoon. She had fun at first. Then she slipped off the sled. She cut her forehead on a rock in the ground.
target: Ella had to be taken to the doctor.

source: Steph usually ate a large breakfast. But her new job meant she had less time to make food. So Steph decided to eat simpler food and smaller portions. And in a month, she lost 10 pounds.
target: Her doctor said she was healthier, too.

source: Bobby was a star football player at his school. He would always get recognition for his talent. One day he was in a very important game. His arm was hurt in the process.
target: Bobby took time to recover from the injury.

source: Susan went to the movie theater with her friends. Susan used her cell phone in the theater to check her e-mail. An usher came and asked Susan to leave the theater. Susan had to wait in the lobby while her friends finished the movie.
target: Susan was upset with the whole ordeal.

source: Margie had a Christmas cactus. It never bloomed. She gave the plant to Desi. Desi took good care of the plant.
target: The cactus flourished under his care.

source: Gina had been at the park with her friend Pam for hours. Now the sun was setting. She said her goodbyes and headed home. When she arrived it was dark out.
target: Gina went straight to bed.

source: Avery was very excited. Tonight was his very first basketball game. He had practiced and his parents came to watch him. Avery played well with his teammates and even scored some points!
target: Avery's parents were proud.

source: Gary loved to garden. Spring was quickly approaching and he wanted to start planting. He checked the Almanac to see which plants were safe for the garden. Tom decided to plant some orchids.
target: The orchids would be beautiful.

source: Bay was nervous. Her boyfriend had been acting weird all through dinner. Bay thought he was going to dump her. But then he got on one knee.
target: And asked her to marry him.

source: Tommy was having a bad day. His friends tried to cheer him up by taking him out. He grumbled but went along. He drank and danced with his friends all night.
target: Tommy had good friends.

source: Ariel is our 5 month old baby. She had woke up the other morning extremely fussy. We couldn't figure out what was wrong at first. We then seen a fresh tooth popping through her gum line.
target: We had a week of hell as her tooth came in.

source: Amelia decided to take a vacation to Mexico. She booked her flight and hotel. When she got to Mexico, she was sure to visit many different things. She loved every moment of it.
target: Amelia decided to vacation to Mexico more often.

source: Sometimes my kids wondered if Santa Claus was real. Each year we left cookies and milk for him on Christmas Eve. Each Christmas day we found an empty cup and cookie crumbs. One year we found cookie pieces outside in the snow.
target: We told the kids that Santa must have share with the reindeer.

source: Amy woke up extra hungry today. Unfortunately, she also woke up very late. She rushed around the house and had no time for breakfast. When she made it to work, she realized her coworker brought breakfast!
target: She was so grateful and promised to pay her coworker back.

source: The school received a grant to make a computer lab. Their IT department did a lot of research to find the best equipment. They bought the equipment with the grant money. The computer lab was a great success.
target: The government continued to fund computer labs.

source: I was captain of the tennis team. We were playing our division rivals. I was tied with my opponent. I had advantage of the deuce.
target: I won the match.

source: Ben is the coach of the basketball team and he held try outs today. He has to cut this one kid because he is not good enough. He feels bad because he knows the kid will be disappointed. He gives the kid advice and things to work on for next season.
target: The kid practiced all year and next year he made the team.

source: Officer Dunn didn't want to hurt anyone during the protest. He told several people to leave but they didn't. He unleashed his police dog. The dog bit a mother and her baby.
target: Officer Dunn was shocked about what his dog had done.

source: I noticed my hair was getting kind of long. I decided to try and get it cut that afternoon. Once I found a suitable barber, I dropped by for a cut. There wasn't a line, it was super quick!
target: I really liked my new hair cut.

source: I drove my motorcycle across the street. I took a path that led to a riding track. I did a few laps. Bored, I drove back home.
target: I cleaned my motorcycle after I got home.

source: Ryan was called by his friend to skip work one day. He missed his train to work and instead went to the park. Ryan and his friend played with birds at the park all day. At the end of the day, they left the park and saw Ryan's boss.
target: Ryan got fired.

source: A man drove for many hours on the highway. He saw a sign for a rest stop two miles away. He put his car in the right lane in anticipation. He took the exit for the rest stop.
target: The man stopped at the rest stop and got out of the car.

source: Josiah was a baby who was trying to crawl for the first time. To help him, his mother put out an exciting toy that jingled. As she made the toy rattle, Josiah became very interested. He started groping the ground and inching towards his mom.
target: Josiah crawled to his mother and took the toy.

source: I wanted a pet for my birthday. I wasn't sure what to get, I already had dogs. I was looking around on facebook and saw a mini pig. I went to pick her up.
target: I drove home with the mini pig in my car.

source: Sam wanted to be a singer. So he joined a singing class at his college. The first day of class, everyone was required to sing a song. Sam was very embarrassed the first day.
target: All his classmates were very supportive though.

source: Growing up, Matt was never the most confident guy. He always had a big crush on his neighbor Lexy, but was scared. However, when prom was approaching, he decided to finally make a move. Matt asked Lexi to be his date, and she immediately said yes.
target: Matt and Lexi had a great time at prom.

source: Shyanne had a spelling test. She wanted to pass it. She studied hard. She made a 100.
target: Shyanne was overjoyed.

source: John wanted pizza, but he was broke. Then he remembered he had won a free pizza last week! He called the pizza place and gave them his code. They sent him his free pizza an hour later.
target: John devoured his pizza.

source: Jill had to attend a dancing class around 8 P.M. He got ready and drove to the meeting place. He was only of the first people to audition. After his performance, the judges were impressed.
target: He received many awards for his dance performances.

source: We tried to stay up late last night. We drank coffee. We ate chocolate. We even ran laps around the couch.
target: Then we collapsed on the couch and slept past noon.

source: Ally had been saving her spare coins in a jar for Years. She wanted a new cell phone but she didn't have enough money. She thought she'd count the change in her change jar. To her surprise, there was over $300 in the jar.
target: So she bought a new cell phone.

source: Mom asked me to go pick up some things at the grocery store. I decided to take my bicycle to the store instead of walking. I met up with a friend and offered her a ride on my bicycle. As we were riding along, my bicycle broke in half.
target: I realized that my bicycle had only been suitable for one rider.

source: In the car the whole family was excited. After 9 hours of driving the were on their grandmother's block. Ahead they could see her house. The house was lit up in spite of the late hour of 4 AM.
target: They couldn't wait to see grandma!

source: Ana had been putting off doing laundry. Finally she could avoid it no longer. She carried all her clothes to the laundromat. Over several hours, she washed and dried them.
target: Ana decided never to wait that long again.

source: Mark went to the mall. He saw a pair of headphones that he wanted but couldn't afford. He decided to steal the headphones. Mark was then caught by someone working.
target: Mark has a court date next week.

source: My friends got me a jigsaw puzzle for christmas. I haven't opened it yet. I always keep planning to but something keeps coming up. Like right now talking with you.
target: But in a moment, I'm going to start the puzzle.

source: Rex hasn't cleaned his room in Year's. Since he rarely has visitors, he doesn't see the point to cleaning. However, one day he decides to tidy up. Rex vacuums the floor and makes his bed.
target: He feels better about his room.

source: I was afraid of the exam tomorrow. Since the exam is tough, I decided to study all night. I decided to skip dinner just to have extra time. Ultimately, I was prepared on the exam day.
target: I aced my exam.

source: My family was on vacation in Italy. We wanted a group photograph. We asked a stranger to take it for us. They obliged.
target: It was our favorite picture of the vacation.

source: I woke up and looked in my closet for a shirt. Everything was dirty and on the floor. I picked up a shirt to see if it smelled bad. I found a blue shirt that didn't stink.
target: I wore the blue shirt.

source: JJ played all day long. When evening came, he was tired. He nearly fell asleep in his bath, and his mother said it was bedtime. His mother put him in pajamas, took him to his bed, and sang to him.
target: He fell asleep.

source: The two hunters debated their location within the forest. They did not know if they had reached the right spot. Their attention was distracted when a huge buck entered the glade. The men were struck with awe.
target: It was then that they knew they were in the right spot.

source: Todd has a huge test tomorrow. He has not studied at all. It counts for 50 percent of his grade. Todd is not sure what to do.
target: Todd decides to study as much as he can before tomorrow.

source: Maggie needed a new friend. She was tired of spending time alone. Finally she met a friend at book club. The girls spent everyday together.
target: Maggie was happy to have a new companion.

source: My roommate got a new job at the place I go to school. We decided to ride to work together. We got in the car and headed out together. The ride seemed much shorter with someone to talk to.
target: When the ride was over, we parted ways.

source: Brittany loved playing video games online. However, people harassed her when they fought out her gender. Brittany almost quit gaming but found a girl gaming group on facebook. After joining she began playing with the girls she met online.
target: She felt better playing with a group of nicer people.

source: Bobby had never been to a carnival before. His friend Sam invited him to go with his family. There was so much to see and do! Bobby's favorite activity was riding on the ferris wheel.
target: Bobby enjoyed the carnival.

source: I was listening to the radio today. A new song came on that I liked. They never said the name of it. I kept listening but it never came up.
target: So I typed the lyrics into google.

source: Al and Val were very close twins. They dressed alike, talked alike and were together 24/7. One day, Val was diagnosed with terminal cancer. She soon died, and Al was completely devastated.
target: Al felt even lonelier as time went on.

source: I've gotten three speeding tickets in my life. All three of them when I was a teenager. I'm surprised I didn't loose my license. It costs me a lot of money to get them all off my record.
target: I now drive at a normal speed.

source: David has always dreamed of visiting Oregon. Although he doesn't have much money, he starts saving a little. Finally David has enough money for his big trip to Oregon. On his trip, he eats local food and sees amazing sights.
target: He has a great time in Oregon.

source: The high school student went to the dentist. She was told she needed braces again. She was not happy. She got braces and was in a lot of pain.
target: But it was worth it when she saw her straightened teeth.

source: Jayne visited Alden, New york. Her uncle owned a farm there. She helped care for the animals. Then she helped harvest the veggies from the garden.
target: Jayne ate a delicious meal from the fruits of her labor.

source: Seth has worked at the air conditioning factory for six Year's. One day his supervisor calls a meeting for the entire department. Seth's supervisor announces that the factory has to shut down. Seth realizes in terror that he needs to find new work.
target: Seth thinks it is a good idea to update his resume.

source: Amy was driving to school when her car stopped. She called her dad. He came and informed her the fuel pump was out. They called a tow truck to tow the car home.
target: Amy then had to walk to school.

source: Rod smoked his entire life. One night he fell asleep while watching television. His cigarette was still lit and fell on the floor. It caught his apartment on fire.
target: Rod died in the fire.

source: Barry was excited that he finally registered to vote. He went to the polling place near his home. While walking into the building he noticed all of the campaign signs. He already knew how he would cast his votes.
target: Barry voted.

source: Johnny was driving one day when he felt a strange bumpiness. He pulled over and saw that his tire was flat! He inspected it closer and saw he had run over a nail. Johnny had to put on the donut and drive to a repair shop.
target: They fixed it and Johnny drove home.

source: Amy wanted more space in her home. She decided to look for a new apartment. Amy found a new apartment for the right price near her job. Amy visited the apartment to see it in person.
target: Amy signed a lease and moved into the apartment.

source: My brothers and I were sharing a pizza. There was only one slice left. We all wanted it. Before anybody could say anything I licked it.
target: I got to eat the slice.

source: May was a shelter cat the pet store took in for adoption day. Cathy and her family visited the pet store on adoption day. Cathy fell in love with May as soon as she saw her. After applying to adopt May and being approved, Cathy adopted May.
target: May and Cathy got along greatly.

source: Monica was an eight year old girl who loved to knit scarves. One day Monica was invited to a birthday. Monica did not have any money to buy her friend a gift. Monica decided to knit her a scarf.
target: Monica was pleased to see her friend admire the homemade gift.

source: The suspect saw that the cell door was unlocked. He pushed on it and it opened. No one was watching him so he made an escape. He calmly walked out of the front of the police station.
target: No one seemed to notice the suspect.

source: A girl falls in love with a boy and he liked her too. She finds out that their parents don't get along. The boy and the girl love each other so much. But, they don't want to hurt their parents feelings so they stay away
target: But eventually they get together anyway.

source: One day, the president of the United States visited my hometown. I waited in line for hours to get to see him. I stood in front of the podium while he gave a stirring speech. As he left, he shook my hand!
target: I was thrilled.

source: Jake's dad took him to his first football game. They got there early and had really good seats. They ate hot dogs and drank soda as well! Jake even saw his favorite player during the game!
target: Jake had a great time at the football game with his dad.

source: I wanted to do something fun. I looked for something cheap to do. I decided I would go swimming. I found a local lake beach to visit.
target: I drove to the beach.

source: Amy was unsatisfied with her paper. Instead of turning it in, she skipped class. She went to a coffee shop to rewrite. She produced a paper she was proud of.
target: Amy got an A on the paper but in trouble for skipping class.

source: Steve was an accomplished carpenter. He had a plan to surprise his wife with a new piece. She had been wanting a new desk, so that's what he decided to make. He cut all the lumber, assembled the desk, and stained it.
target: Steve's wife was ecstatic about the gift.

source: I don't believe in luck. But my girlfriend's dad broke a mirror yesterday. Not even five second later he slammed his hand in the car door. Then on his way to the hospital he hits a deer.
target: As if his luck couldn't get any worse, the hospital was closed.

source: Jon felt like a bad dad. He worked so late, he often missed his kids when he came home. On the weekends, he was tired and grumpy. One Saturday, his son sat down on the couch and leaned on Jon's arm.
target: Jon loved spending time with the kids.

source: Ben walked along the street and found the end of a length of string. He picked it up and pulled on it. More string came but not the end. Ben followed the string to see where it went.
target: Ben was fascinated by the string.

source: Juan wanted to be a luchador. He grew up watching them on television. He practiced every day in the basement. Eventually he got added to small shows.
target: Juan was very successful eventually.

source: On Sunday, Tori found out she was pregnant! She immediately called her husband to share the good news. Tori's husband was just as excited. The two discussed baby names for nearly half an hour.
target: They finally decided on one boy name and one girl name.

source: Sara works next door to a bakery. She is on a diet so she can never go there. One day she notices the bakery has closed down. The next week a healthy organic juice shop opens.
target: Sara was then able to stop by and get food.

source: Rufus has just enrolled in a new school and he has no friends there. At first he feels apprehensive and worried he won't meet anyone. However, a nice guy named Ralph introduces himself to Rufus one day. They realize that they are in the same Chemistry class.
target: They decide to be lab partners in their class together.

source: Tom wanted a Chemistry set for Christmas. His mom said it was too dangerous for a little boy. Tom asked for a puppy instead, and his mom suddenly changed her mind. Tom didn't understand why, but he didn't care.
target: He was happy to get the Chemistry set.

source: Early every morning the hummingbirds visit my porch. Today as I watched them they seemed agitated. One particular bird was acting very territorial. Suddenly a big black bird swooped in from out of nowhere.
target: It ate the territorial hummingbird easily.

source: Io was appearing in a school play. Her costume required a hoop skirt. Io couldn't find hoops anywhere! Her mom decided to craft the hoops herself at home.
target: Lo had the best costume in the play.

source: I was at my first day of work. My manager was wearing a Beatles T Shirt. We both talked about our love for the Beatles. We became good friends.
target: We later decided to start a small band.

source: Tyler went to a baseball game. He saw his favorite team! His team played hard. His team won!
target: Tyler was elated!

source: Flora's tooth started to hurt. She hated the dentist, so she tried to ignore it. The pain got worse and worse. Finally, Flora had to call for a dentist appointment.
target: The dentist was able to make her tooth feel better.

source: Derek likes to read. He read all of the books in his house. He needed more to read but didn't have money. Derek got a library card!
target: Derek now read all the time.

source: I went to a bar with some friends of mine. I was broke, but thought I could keep them company. It turns out that they were all broke as well. None of us bought anything, and we talked for hours.
target: The bar asked me and my friends to leave after a while.

source: I was at the laundromat last Sunday. There was a cute girl doing her laundry there too. I went up and started making small talk. She smiled but didn't seem interested.
target: I left her alone but kept sneaking little glances.

source: Pat woke up with the urge to play hooky from work. So he called in that morning using a fake sick voice. Not even an hour after calling in he gets a text. It tells him work is cancelled because it's snowing.
target: Pat felt silly for pretending to be sick.

source: Greg was riding his bike to the store. An arm emerged from an alleyway as Greg passed. Greg fell from the bike as he was pushed to the ground. He watched from the sidewalk as a man rode away with his bike.
target: Greg filed a police report and they eventually caught the thief.

source: Johnson has never liked being outdoors very much. His girlfriend teases him that he could never go on a camping trip. Johnson decides to prove her wrong. He packs up a tent and goes camping for a long weekend.
target: He had a miserable weekend, but told his girlfriend it was great.

source: Jim lost his wallet that had all of his money it. He would have no more money for food for his family until next month. Meanwhile, Pete found a wallet lying in the bank parking lot. It contained hundreds of dollars and Pete really wanted a new TV.
target: So, Pete kept the wallet and bought a new TV with the money.

source: Sally had an older sister who was good at everything. One day she told her sister Mary she felt insecure. Mary laughed her off and told her that she had many strengths too. Sally looked at herself in a different way.
target: Sally felt better.

source: I had to take my son to the emergency room this summer. He was playing football with some friends and got hit in the head. He split his eyebrow open and we worried he had fractured his face. Thankfully, there was no fracture.
target: He has a scar from the stitches.

source: Little Lorelei is eight months old and teething. Her mother has tried everything to sooth her. She has tried cool teething rings, medicines, and gentle soothing tea. In a last effort she gives her a teething biscuit.
target: Lorelei calmed down after getting the teething biscuit.

source: I was at the park the other day. I walked near the lake and saw some ducks. I decided to throw them some bread. They chased after me in an angry fashion.
target: I ran away from the ducks.

source: Graham wanted to get a selfie stick. He didn't have many friends but loved taking pictures. He finally took the plunge and bought one. He used it a few times and then forgot about it.
target: Eventually he threw it away.

source: Lewis knew the cave like the back of his hand. Five first-time cavers walked behind him. Suddenly, a few bats flew down from the darkness above. All the people but Lewis ran back towards the cave's entrance.
target: Lewis laughed and told them not be afraid of the bats.

source: Sean and Sara were going to buy a guitar. Sean picked Sara up and they drove to the store. Inside, they played with several different guitars. Sara picked her favorite and they brought it to the counter.
target: Sara made the purchase enthusiastically.

source: Chris was not looking forward to going to school on Friday. There was a difficult test coming that he was not ready for. When he went to bed on Thursday he was worried. When he woke up Friday morning almost a foot of snow had fallen!
target: Bill felt relieved.

source: Martha was a terrible cook and her boyfriend knew it. He introduced her to cooking shows and watched them with her. She would practice things she learned on the shows. As the days went by her cooking began to slowly get better.
target: After a while, everything Martha cooked was delicious.

source: There was a stray cat who loved my cat. He came by to see her everyday. I eventually took him in and let him inside, and named him Tokyo. He got very sick, out of nowhere.
target: I took him to the vet to treat him and he got better.

source: An office downtown had a red carpet. The office staff complained it was always dirty. But none of their vacuums could properly clean it. So they hired a professional carpet cleaner.
target: The carpet looked almost new after it was cleaned.

source: Lexi wanted to be healthy. But she wanted hot cocoa. So she decided not to add any sugar. The hot cocoa tasted boring.
target: Being healthy isn't always fun.

source: Anna wanted chicken wings. She drove her car all the way to Buffalo. There, she found an authentic wing restaurant. She ordered herself a dozen hot wings.
target: Anna ate all the wings as she drove home.

source: My brother kept fighting me for the remote last week. Finally we decided to divide its use. We would each get to have it one day. My brother then got into a fight who should have it the first day.
target: I agreed to let my brother use the remote first.

source: Ivy was flying in a small sightseeing plane. Suddenly the pilot made an announcement. The plane had a rudder problem and was going down! Ivy quickly braced in the crash position.
target: When the plane suddenly corrected, Ivy felt a wave of relief.

source: Joey was a second grader that like to color in coloring books. He had worn down most of his crayons so he only had brown and black. His parents thought that Joey was an artist because of his odd colors. They hung his work on the fridge for everyone to admire.
target: Joey felt proud of himself.

source: John had a huge client presentation tomorrow, but he felt unprepared. It's not that he was nervous presenting. John had always felt comfortable in front of crowds. This content, however, lacked polish and needed refinement.
target: John reworked the presentation, and it was a great success.

source: Fred decided to play the lottery. He loved playing but never won. Yesterday he bought two tickets, When he went home he found out great news.
target: Fred had won the lottery.

source: Gina was using a restroom at a gas station. She went to wash her hands, but there was no soap. She looked in the cabinet under the sink hoping to find some. There was no soap there either.
target: So she had to settle for rinsing her hands off.

source: When it was time to eat, Mother rang the bell. Dad and Bill knew that sound when they heard it. They dropped their yard work, carefully, and washed their hands. Mother was happy when they finally arrived in the house.
target: The family sat down, and enjoyed a meal together.

source: Emmy's dad took her to chose a kitten. There were two together in a cage. She couldn't split them up! It made her sad to have to chose.
target: Then, Emmy's dad said she could keep both kittens.

source: Jill went to college. Jill studied really hard. Jill passed all her tests. Jill got her diploma.
target: Jill found a nice job.

source: Jerry had always wanted to learn how to play guitar. He was worried that he was too old to learn something new. However, he decided to enroll in weekly guitar classes. Finally he became a reasonably good guitar player.
target: Jerry decided to play his guitar for his friends.

source: Kyle collected many things. He had an extensive collection of action figures. Every day, he went looking for new figures for his collection. He managed to add a new figure once a month or so.
target: Kyle was really into Marvel heros.

source: Francine noticed that all of her friends wore high heeled shoes. Although she loved how heels looked, she hated how they felt. One day she decided to wear a pair of flats to meet her friends. All of her friends complimented how great they looked.
target: Francine was glad that she wore comfortable  shoes!

source: When I was young I loved hide and sneak. I would play it even when others didn't know. I would just hide and jump out at people. I did this all the time in elementary school.
target: When I got older, I had to stop jumping out at people.

source: Rachel was looking at her daily mail. She found a letter written in a foreign language. Rachel showed the letter to her friends. No one could read or understand the letter.
target: Rachel took it to a language professor for translation.

source: Deb got fired from her job due to cutbacks. She was very upset and went home to sulk. Her husband told her everything would be alright, but Deb wasn't sure. The next day, Deb's husband set her up with a interview at his job.
target: She got the job.

source: Bethany was self-conscious about her arm hair. She tried shaving it off. It grew back within a few weeks. She got a laser hair removal treatment.
target: She felt better about herself.

source: Gina's parents were driving to Illinois. Gina sat in the back seat squished by her siblings. To make matters worse it was rush hour. Traffic was creeping along slowly.
target: Gina closed her eyes and did her best to go to sleep.

source: One summer my sister and I set up a lemonade stand. It was the first month at a new house and we didn't know anyone. Few people walked by and even fewer stopped. The old pastor walked over from next door.
target: He bought lemonade and made us feel welcome in the neighborhood.

source: Bob moved from a small town to a large city. He was concerned he would always get lost. The first day he got lost trying to get home from work. Then Bob bought a navigation system to help him learn his way around.
target: The navigation system helped Bob a lot.

source: Kelly was reading about hybrid animals online. And she saw pictures of ligers. She was impressed by their size and strength. But she wondered if they could live in the wild.
target: Kelly had only seen them  in  the  zoo.

source: Jorie went with her family to visit Anne Frank's home in Amsterdam. She read the book beforehand. She thought the home was quite small. Her mother cried while watching through the museum.
target: Jorie admitted it was a very emotional tour.

source: Clara went home from work one day. Then she realized she had locked herself out! Her keys were left on the kitchen table that morning. She had to call her mom for help.
target: Clara's mom helped right away.

source: The other day I was cleaning up a bit around the apartment. I decided to get rid of all the clutter and papers on the table. Underneath all of them was an older letter from my girlfriend. It said she wanted to break up with me.
target: I was angry and confused by the letter.

source: Ben was married to his high school sweetheart. They were married for many Year's. Ben realized one day that he was unhappy in his marriage. He decided to have an affair.
target: His wife found out and they got a divorce.

source: One man bet another that he could outstare a duck. A duck was found and stared at. Although the duck was unaware of what was happening, it did not blink. It did, however, wet its eyes with its nictitating membrane.
target: The man eventually blinked.

source: Shay went to the marine park. There she saw a sign advertising dolphin swims. Shay eagerly handed over her $40 and suited up. Then she jumped in the pool to swim with the dolphins.
target: Shay had a great time.

source: Lia went to England. She took a bus tour. The tour stopped at Stonehenge. Lia got out of the bus to look.
target: Lia took many photos of Stonehenge.

source: I was drinking a glass of juice. My cup spilled on the counter. I looked for something to clean the spill. I found a pack of paper towels.
target: I mopped up the mess.

source: Arthur and his friends were hanging out. They were drinking beers and talking. All of a sudden the beer ran out. Arthur didn't want to take the last one.
target: Arthur ordered another round for his friends.

source: Hester has always loved how her hair looks straight. One day she is invited to attend an art gallery opening. She decides to straighten her hair for the event. Her friends all compliment her on how good it looks.
target: Hester is proud of her appearance.

source: Jill wanted to buy a new car. Jill drove her old car down to the car dealership. The salesman traded Jill's old car for a new car. After paying the salesman as well, Jill got her new car.
target: Jill was excited.

source: Jaden was quite forgetful. He had not noticed that it was already Valentine's Day. Feeling rushed, he went out and got some flowers and chocolate. Jaden's girlfriend came home and found the treats.
target: Jaden had saved the day.

source: John got a bike for his birthday. He didn't know how to ride. He practiced all week long. At the end of the week he took off his training wheels.
target: He was able to ride the bike just fine without them.

source: Quentin had never been on a boat in his life. One summer a friend invited Quentin to his lake house. When they were there, Quentin and his friend went sailing. It was an exhilarating experience.
target: Quentin was glad that he went.

source: A man ordered pancakes in a diner from the server. She brought him a plate of pancakes minutes later. The man complained that the pancakes were too thick. The server brought them back to the cook.
target: The cook decided to remake the pancakes.

source: My children wanted to get a pet. As a family we decided that this was a great idea. We went to our local animal shelter to find our new furry friend. Upon arriving we met a black lab who we all automatically loved.
target: We adopted the black lab and took her home.

source: My garden flowers are dying. They are wilting and dry from the sun. My friend came by to help evaluate what is wrong with my plants. She discovered they needed more water.
target: After watering them more, my plants look better than ever.

source: Jill was playing video games with her sister. Jill was angry that she was losing every game. Jill took her game controller and threw it at the TV. The TV screen cracked right down the center.
target: Jill and her sister could not play any more videogames.

source: I started to binge-watch "Buffy the Vampire Slayer". After a few hours, I felt like running. Unfortunately, it was dark outside. I stood in the doorway for a while.
target: Then I imagined that I was Buffy and went running.

source: At 12 Year's old, Drew decided to be a criminal. He made up his mind to kick in doors and rob houses. He practiced kicking in the doors of closets to build his strength. His mother came home and saw all the closet doors broken.
target: His mother was very angry.

source: For a long time, every time I made hardboiled eggs, they came out bad. I looked all over the internet for a solution to my problem. A website suggested I bake my eggs instead of boil them. I did just as it asked.
target: The baked eggs were great.

source: A boy saw a quarter lying on the sidewalk. He bent down and picked it up. As he did so, a spitball flew where his head had been. Looking around, he saw his archenemy holding a straw.
target: The boy was angry.

source: Hector notices that only one ear of his headphones work. He wants to get a new pair so he can listen to music. Finally he finds a good pair of headphones that he can afford. He buys them and immediately starts listening to music.
target: Hector is happy that both ears work.

source: Tom wanted to go to a New York Giants game. However, the tickets were too expensive. Finally, he found tickets that were in his price range. He ended up sitting in the upper deck.
target: He enjoyed watching the game anyway.

source: Trip loved watermelon. He would eat at least one a day. His mom always told him he would grow a tree swallowing seeds. He always swallowed them anyways.
target: Trip enjoyed the flavor of the seeds.

source: Angie, an MTurk worker, saw herself as diligent. One day one of her favorite requesters rejected her work. Angie was very surprised and emailed them. They responded that her work hadn't been good enough.
target: Angie tried to discuss the issue in detail.

source: Donovan asked Trina to go dancing with him. Trina liked Donovan so she said yes but she was really worried. After school she ran home to ask her Dad for help. When her Dad came home she explained the situation and Dad smiled.
target: Trina's dad taught her how to dance.

source: Andy had always wanted a big kids bike. When he turned six Year's old he asked for a bike for his birthday. He did not know how to ride a bike. On Andy's birthday his mother gave him a bike.
target: His dad taught him how to ride it.

source: Suzy went to the ice cream store. She ordered a vanilla milkshake. When she tried to pay the man for her milkshake, he smiled at her. He told her that she won a special contest.
target: He gave her the milkshake for free.

source: Ned and his friends went to the fair. He used the last of his money to buy a fluffy cotton candy. As he was walking away, he saw a little boy crying. He had dropped his cotton candy into a puddle.
target: So Ned gave him his own cotton candy.

source: Sebastian noticed it was sunny and warm out. He had chores to do. He didn't feel like doing his chores. Sebastian decided that being outdoors was better.
target: Sebastian walked outdoors and went for a walk.

source: Rashid was an excellent car driver. One day Rashid's brother was late for work. Rashid offered to drive his brother. They got there with time to spare.
target: His brother was grateful.

source: Ali went to a fast food place and paid with her credit card. The cashier took a very long time bringing her card back. A few days later, Ali found unusual transactions on her card. She called her bank, who reversed the charges.
target: She wondered if the cashier had stolen her information.

source: I was looking for a nice painting for my living room. Hence yesterday I went out looking. I finally found a beautiful one I loved. The painting was of a waterfall.
target: I purchased it and brought it home.

source: I was wanting to get a promotion. I decided to try to get promoted. All year, I worked very hard. My boss took notice and called me into his office one day.
target: I received the promotion I wanted.

source: Maggie and her parents were moving to a new town. Maggie was nervous because she didn't know anyone. As soon as she moved in, she went around introducing herself. She ended up making some friends.
target: Maggie liked the new town.

source: Dan was walking home from school and saw the window display. There was a train set in the window of the store. Dan wished so badly that he could own this train set. When Dan got home his mother told him she had a surprise.
target: She gave Dan the train.

source: Gina wanted to steal her mother's house key. She waited until her mother was taking a nap. She took her mom's purse to the bathroom. She removed the key from the chain quietly.
target: Then Gina placed the purse right back where she found it.

source: There was a man from kentucky. He loved a girl who lived in Louisiana. He decided he needed to move. He moved to be with his love.
target: The man moved to Kentucky.

source: Tim was failing math class. He knew if he didn't pass he would have to go to summer school. He studied hard and asked for extra credit. On the last day of school he found out he passed!
target: Tim was thrilled.

source: Mary-Anne was feeling lonely and decided to adopt a cat. She went to her local humane society to start the process. While she was looking, one of the cats meowed at her. Mary-Anne pet the cat, and it was love at first sight.
target: She took the cat home with her.

source: I took gymnastics as a child. I was learning the balance beam and doing moves on it. As I did a round off flipping off the beam, I landed wrong. I broke my ankle and was in so much pain!
target: I was rushed to the hospital.

source: There were six puppies running around my foyer. It was going to be hard to choose the one we wanted to buy. Each of my daughters picked out a different pup. The owner said we could get a discount on two dogs.
target: We each bought one dog.

source: Johnny wanted a change from his big city life in Boston. He decided he would be happier in America's Heartland. Finally the day had arrived, Johnny moved to Idaho. He had escaped the big city life.
target: Johnny was happy to be in a small town.

source: Joan hated going home for Christmas. She knew that her mother would hound her about her love life. This year on her way home she was in a car accident. Her mother raced to her side to care for her needs.
target: Joan felt good at seeing her mother's face.

source: I spend all of my time working on my writing. As a result I have begun to feel quite lonely. I've decided to join an online dating community. As I join, I realize that I don't particularly like other people.
target: I began to write more.
