source: My daughter was a girl scout in elementary school. One day she went on an overnight field trip. My wife went as a chaperone. Everyone stayed in a cabin in New Hampshire for a weekend.
target: My daughter never forgot her field trip.

source: Today was the club opening of a new club around the corner. I couldn't wait to attend. As we got in the club it was beautiful. We ordered delicious food and danced.
target: We befriended the bouncer so we would get into the club tomorrow.

source: Yesterday I was carrying a new glass into the kitchen. To my surprise I dropped it. The glass shattered. I had to pick it up.
target: I cut myself on a small piece.

source: Bill's family lived on a hill. It never rained or stormed there. One day a tornado was going through the area. Bill's house got hit, and the roof ripped off.
target: The insurance company covered the charges for a new roof.

source: Allison decided she wanted to learn more about her area's history. She went down to the library to check out a book on it. She went inside and couldn't understand how the books were sorted. She found a librarian who explained the dewey decimal system.
target: That helped her find what she wanted.

source: Sebastian wanted to play football on his friends team. He talked to his friend and found out he needed to go to practice. He practiced catching the football at home all week. He went to the next practice and scored a touchdown.
target: Sebastian was happy that his practice paid off.

source: Once there was a mother who was desperate for her baby to sleep. She walked him around but still he did not sleep. She fed him but still he did not sleep. Finally, she remembered the lullaby her mother had sung to her.
target: The mother gently sung the lullaby to her baby.

source: Johnny used to pee in swimming pools  as a kid. He thought he could do it as an adult. He took his kids to a water park. Next he peed in the wading pool.
target: Some people noticed and Johnny got in trouble.

source: Amy watched the other kids play and stared at her inhaler. Because of asthma she couldn't play sports. She felt her art teacher's hand on her shoulder. Her teacher smiled and told Amy she would be a great artist one day.
target: Amy felt so much better.

source: Joe and his friends had their soccer game today. Joe was nervous. He was nervous if he would win or not. Finally after the game, Joe's team won.
target: Joe was very proud of his team.

source: Mark had a big interview for a new job. He prepared himself for the questions they may ask. The interviewer seemed to be impressed with Mark's answers. The interviewer informed Mark he had the job.
target: Mark was very happy.

source: Elaine did not feel like cooking tonight. Therefore, Elaine decided that she would go out to eat. However, Elaine did not know where she wanted to eat. Elaine deliberated on where she should go for almost an hour.
target: Elaine found it difficult to make up her mind.

source: Sam was trying to get into the college of his dream. He spent a long time filling out the application. It made him feel good about his academic achievements. He submitted the application.
target: 3 months later he received an acceptance letter.

source: Matt decided to go bar hopping with his two friends one night. They drank 3 shots in one bar. They went to 4 more, drinking 3 shots in each. Matt ended up getting too drunk and lost his phone.
target: Matt and friends walked home and slept it off.

source: Bindu planned a party with her friends. They met at her house to discuss what food and band to use. One of Bindu's friends brought samosas and doogh. Four friends played music at the party.
target: Everyone had a great time.

source: Tyler wakes up and needs to shower before school. His little brother is using the shower. Tyler is worried he will miss the bus. Finally it is Tyler's turn to shower.
target: Tyler takes a quick shower and gets to the bus stop on time.

source: Thomas had been feeling under the radar lately. He went to his doctor to get a checkup. His doctor told him that his cholesterol levels were a little bit high. Thomas started eating healthier and going on walks.
target: His doctor was very pleased at his next checkup.

source: The doorbell rang but no one was there. She was unsure as to whether she should open the door or not. Slowly she creaked open the door and peered outside. Her brother leaped out at her and gave her a good scare.
target: She screamed and pushed her brother away.

source: Stephanie wanted to make applesauce. She decided to drive to the farm market to pick some delicious apples. As she was walking through the orchard she tripped and fell. She broke both of her wrists.
target: Stephanie could not get up until someone found her.

source: Roy couldn't figure out why his apartment smelled so bad. His friends commented on it when they went over. Everyone decided to look for the source. It turned out to be an old fish in the refrigerator.
target: Roy threw out the old fisher and everything smelled better.

source: Jimmy grew up very poor. However, his parents always did his best to provide for him. When he got into a good college, they worked two jobs to afford it. When he graduated, he wanted to show his appreciation.
target: So he repaid them for college.

source: Jill was surprised when a handsome boy asked her to the college dance. As her roommates got ready, Jill fussed about her hair. Jill's roommates said they could help. Jill finished dressing into her toga-like white gown.
target: Her date arrived and complimented her appearance.

source: A bar owner put out a large banner to advertise his bar. The wind was strong and blew the banner away. The owner chased his banned across town. It landed in the backyard of an old woman.
target: The old woman refused to give back the banner.

source: My mother has a recipe for pumpkin bars that I like quite a lot. She once made them for me because I was having a bad day. I ate the pumpkin bars and I felt much better. The bars reminded me that my mother cares about me.
target: I made pumpkin bars later in life and they reminded me of my mom.

source: Tim decided to spend more time with his granddad. His grandpa loved birdwatching, so Tim watched with him. They marked their sightings in a notebook. Soon Tim was really interested!
target: Tim and his grandad found a hobby that they both enjoyed.

source: Danny was working at the local ice cream shop this summer. He was very excited to have started his first job. On his first day a little boy dropped his ice cream on the floor. Without hesitation, Danny knew just what to do.
target: He gave him another scoop of ice cream.

source: The school bell rang when the clock struck 2. Gina was never more happy for a day to end. She grabbed her things and waited at the door for Tami. But Tami was leaving with Rita and Mary.
target: Gina felt lonely when she went home.

source: Laurence and his family decided to move. First they packed up their furniture. They then packed up everything else. All their belongings were moved into the van.
target: Laurence and his family drove to their new home.

source: Joy wanted to find the perfect shell for her hermit crab. She could buy one, but it would be more special if she found it. She scoured the beach all morning. Everything that might work was broken!
target: She had to buy a shell after all.

source: Westin was getting married! He wanted his wedding to go perfectly. Everything went well until the evening. Someone got very intoxicated and fell into the cake!
target: Weston and his wife kicked out the intoxicated person.

source: Joe was helping his dad clear the woods in the back of their yard. All of a sudden he heard loud buzzing. He had stirred up a bee's nest. He got stung six times before he could escape.
target: Joe was angry he got hurt.

source: It was autumn. Todd's yard was full of leaves. He decided he needed to rake them all up. Once he was done, he put them all in a bag.
target: Todd put them out in the trash.

source: Tim had dreams of becoming a great bodybuilder. He worked out every night to try to reach his goal. His hard work paid off and he earned a spot in a popular contest. He showed his skills, lifting more than 250 lbs.
target: Tim was very determined.

source: Henry was walking to his class. At the same time, he was trying to clean his phone screen with a cloth. Unfortunately, someone bumped into him. His phone fell out of his hand and landed on the ground.
target: The person apologized to Henry.

source: Tami decided to attend volleyball tryouts. She was only in the 8th grade, but she knew she was good. She played hard and gave it her all. She hadn't anticipated the other players would be as good as her.
target: All the players were good but she made the team.

source: Bob and Jim were playing ball in the house one day. They knocked over the vase and it broke into many pieces. They were afraid their mom would get angry at them. They found some glue, and carefully glued the vase back together.
target: The glue held the vase together and their mom never found out.

source: Steve was very sad. Steve's girlfriend broke up with him. He decided to write a song to her. He poured his heart into the song.
target: Steve wondered if they could ever get back together.

source: Gloria wanted to buy flowers for her husband. Gloria was shocked at the price of even just half a dozen lilies. Gloria decided to pick some of her own flowers from the garden. She got together some daffodils and chrysanthemums.
target: Gloria's husband appreciated the gesture.

source: Josh played basketball every day. His goal was to be able to make any basket on the court. One day, someone challenged him to a contest. Whoever makes the most shots would be the winner!
target: He made the most shots and won the contest.

source: Lauren has always wanted to wear skinny jeans to parties. However, she needs to lose weight so the skinny jeans will look good. Lauren begins a challenging exercise regimen. Finally she has lost enough weight to wear skinny jeans.
target: She wore them proudly to the next party.

source: I went to Hawaii in high school. Our entire band class was going. It took 9 hours to fly there. It was a tropical paradise.
target: I decided that I wanted to go to Hawaii more.

source: Sonny lived in Texas, and it was a hot summer. He was so sick of the heat. He decided to find a way to cool off. At first, he couldn't think of anything.
target: He then decided to jump into his pool.

source: Chad was an incredible singer. He was just too afraid to sing. He wanted to join a church choir but thought his friends would laugh. Due to him being so embarrassed by his skill and passion.
target: Instead of laughing, everyone applauded when Chad finally sang.

source: Ronald had two kids, a boy and a girl. That was more than enough. He really didn't want two to be honest. One day his wife told him baby three was on the way.
target: He was deeply unhappy but afraid to leave.

source: I was taking a hike last Wednesday. While walking I stumbled across something that scared me. Their in front me was a 4 foot snake with beady eyes. I screamed and ran all the way back to the main road.
target: I followed the road back to my car.

source: Mary liked to drink coffee every morning. Today she was in a hurry. She went to a drive through coffee place. She noticed the coffee was the wrong order after she drove away.
target: Mary kept driving and drank it anyway.

source: Bill had just moved to a big city for work. He felt lonely because he did not know anybody in the town. After work one day Bill decided to join some coworkers for drinks. He had a lot of fun hanging out with them.
target: Bill made a lot of friends that day.

source: Billy wanted to become a doctor. He went to college to become a doctor. After he graduated with his degree, he changed his mind. Billy became a nurse instead of a doctor.
target: He never regretted his decision.

source: Quinton was getting evicted from his apartment. He was broke with no income. One day, he decided to spend his last dollar on the lotto. To his disbelief, he won $50,000!
target: Quinton was so happy.

source: After Igor woke up he began to get ready for work. He turned on the shower and waited for it to get hot. The water remained cold. He debated between taking a cold shower and not showering.
target: Igor took a cold shower.

source: Tara preferred big band music to all alternatives. She loved all the horns and other brass instruments involved. She tried to find fellow big band lovers. Her attempts were futile.
target: Tara still enjoyed listening on her own!

source: I traveled to Washington DC to visit my boyfriend. We went many places around town. But one place I wanted to go was the White House. He took me to the White House, and I was so happy.
target: We took the tour and enjoyed the history of the place.

source: My son bought a drum set for his one year old niece last fall. The set had drumsticks, a cymbal, and a seat. His niece lives in NYC. She saw it when she visited, and was thrilled.
target: She wanted to play the drums.

source: Maggie had her first piano recital tonight. She was very nervous. When she got on stage she was shaking. Thankfully she ended up playing perfectly.
target: Maggie was encouraged to do more.

source: Ed liked movie night with the family. They would get treats and drinks and huddle around the tv. They were watching Aladdin tonight. But Ed fell asleep before it ended.
target: Ed regretted falling asleep.

source: I decided I wanted to sign up for a christmas club with my bank. I called the teller and asked when i could do this. She told me I could come in at any time. I went in this morning and signed up for the plan.
target: I am glad I signed up.

source: Mac had a vegan friend coming for dinner. He groaned, knowing he couldn't make steak or hamburgers. Then he remembered an alfredo sauce recipe made with cashews. To his surprise, the sauce came out creamy and delicious.
target: They all enjoyed the meal.

source: Ryan used to work for mall security. He often worked the night shift. One day, he saw a raccoon in the mall. He stared at it for hours until it left.
target: Ryan decided his job was rather dull.

source: Johnny's teacher treated the class to homemade snow cones. The teacher let each student pick a colored syrup topping. When his turn came, Johnny got mad when he saw only one color left. Johnny's teacher asked what was wrong.
target: Johnny told the teacher he was upset he didn't get more colors.

source: Tim had to choose between three girls to date. He liked all three of them but he needed to make a decision. He talked to all three of them to see who liked him more. He eventually went with the girl who wanted to see him more.
target: Tim was satisfied.

source: Jill convinced her boyfriend Joe to go look for Geocache with her. He didn't think it sounded like fun but decided to humor her. They searched the location where the Geocache was supposed to be. After over an hour of searching they were unable to find it.
target: Jill hoped they would find it soon.

source: Brigid and her friend Ella both took piano lessons. Ella's father bought her an expensive grand piano by a renowned maker. Brigid's father could only afford to buy her a used upright piano. But Ella was a foolish and insensitive girl who never practiced.
target: Ella did not ever become good at piano.

source: Dave wanted buy a gun. He went to the gun store and asked many questions. He looked at big guns and little guns. He decided he wanted to buy a big shotgun.
target: Dave bought it and enjoyed his purchase.

source: Rose took a train to Long Island. There, she went to the very tip of the island. She went to the beach at Montauk Point. It was cold and windswept.
target: Rose shielded her face from the wind.

source: Drew was using a typewriter for a special project. He tried to be careful since he couldn't erase his words. However, he ended up falling asleep. His head landed on the keys and several letters were typed.
target: Drew had to start typing the paper over again.

source: Sarah always had a fascination with the night sky. Noticing her passion, Sarah's father bought her a new telescope. She was ecstatic. She went outside every night to diligently view the night sky.
target: Sarah loved her new telescope.

source: Kristen was tired of her room. She need to move it around for a change. She hadn't moved it in over four Year's. After moving everything she saw a huge stain where her bed covered.
target: She decided to put a rug over the stain.

source: My sister moved in with me when she was 35. She'd been living with a wife beater in a rundown trailer park. The man tracked her down to my house one cold, dark night. He broke into my house while we were sleeping.
target: We woke up to find him sneaking in the through a window.

source: My parents fell out of love. I'm not sure when it happened but it seems to have been mutual. They decided to end things amicably. Although I'm hurt by this I'm glad they chose what makes them happy.
target: My parents was to live separate lives.

source: Anna was going to have a baby sibling. Her mom went into the hospital and Anna was hopeful. She really wanted a little sister, but not a brother! When her mom returned home with the baby, Anna was overjoyed.
target: The new baby was a girl.

source: Monica decided to play Truth or Dare with her friends. They were all afraid to confess anything and only picked Dare. The Dares got progressively more elaborate as the day wore on. Monica dared a friend to shoplift doritos and the friend did it.
target: Monica and her friends enjoyed the doritos before the next Dare.

source: Ray went to a friend's house for a sleepover. He realized that he'd forgotten his toothbrush. He was unable to brush his teeth! Ray tried to use toothpaste on his finger, but it was no use.
target: Finally, Ray  asked his friend if he had a spare toothbrush.

source: Ellie had a lot of homework to do. She started with her math homework. After she had finished that, she wrote a book report. The last assignment was a study guide, which took her ten minutes.
target: Ellie was felt prepared for her schooling.

source: Don loved comic books. He consistently collected issues of his favorite stories. As he grew older his love for comics grew. He decided that he wanted to start his own comic book company.
target: He named it Don's Comics.

source: Arnold was scared of bats. He thought that if they bite him he would turn into a vampire. One day he saw a bat in his bathroom. He freaked out so much he screamed.
target: The bat flew directly toward the source of the scream.

source: Annabelle loves to sing. She sings in her school choir. Mary noticed Annabelle's great singing voice. Mary asked Annabelle to be in her band.
target: Annabelle said yes and was excited for the opportunity.

source: Uki was traveling in Africa. One night, he was bit by a black mamba. Uki screamed in pain! He was rushed to the local hospital.
target: They gave him the antidote which saved his life.

source: Sean was homeless. He begged for money on the streets. For one week, no one gave him money. He was starving.

source: Two hobos agreed to make dinner together. Each set out to find ingredients. The first returned with a worn boot. The second returned with a gross of wing nuts.

source: Judy and Bill were preparing to have dinner with their parents. Judy makes a roast with potatoes and rolls with gravy. Bill sets the table and puts on some background music. The doorbell rings, it is their parents.

source: Sal hurt his leg when his wife accidentally tripped him. She felt so bad that she waited on him hand and foot. She bought him food and gave him messages. Sal liked all the attention.

source: Rebecca met Jake when they were both six Year's old. They became best friends and grew up together. When they were 13 Year's old, Jakels family moved away. He promised Rebecca he would come back for her.

source: One weekend we wanted to see a movie with the kids. There were two movies they wanted to see. So we decided to divide and conquer. Two kids and myself went to one and my husband and our son another.

source: Kay built himself a raft. He used planks of scrap wood, and nails. He worked hard on it all spring. Come summer, he tested it out in the lake.

source: In 1997 I rode on an old bus. A local group rented a 1957 transit bus, painted in old colors. I rode on the bus as it went all over suburban Boston. I took plenty of photos.

source: On Christmas morning, I woke up at 5 AM like when I was a child. I sat in front of the tree in the dark and admired the lights. The presents looked beautiful, all wrapped up, underneath the tree. I made two mugs of hot chocolate and woke up my husband.

source: Jim tried out for the basketball team and was cut at try outs. Jim was upset but at the same time motivated to prove everyone wrong. During the entire off season, Jim worked on his game. He improved his shooting, dribbling, passing, and defense.
target: Jim made the basketball team the next time.

source: Mary had a credit card debt of over $2000. She wanted to pay it off. She cut off her unnecessary expenses such as going out. She saved all her money in a savings account.
target: Gradually, Mary was able to pay off her debt.

source: John had worked hard on his homework but couldn't find it anywhere. Then he came upon some paper scraps on the floor. His dog, Betty, was sitting nearby with a paper scrap in her mouth. John was worried his teacher would think he was lying.
target: John didn't know what to do.

source: Tommy and Billy started a lemonade stand. They sold a glass of lemonade for a quarter each. They sold sixteen glasses in one day to people. Tommy wasn't sure how to split the profits, so Billy helped.
target: They shared the money equally.

source: Tori was so excited to go trick or treating. She put on her costume and ran out the door. She began to eat the candy as fast as she got it. Soon her stomach hurt.
target: Tori fell ill because of eating too much candy.

source: Beverly was ready for a change. She decided to pack all her stuff and load her car and leave. She figured everything is big in Texas and she would just get lost. In the big city she could be anyone and do anything she wanted.
target: Once there, she got her dream job.

source: John felt like he was coming down with a cold. It was very cold outside that morning and he felt terrible. He called into work and told his boss he was ill. Then John got up and had breakfast and felt better.
target: John had a nice day off of work.

source: Sally like pizza night on fridays. The family got two pizzas one with no cheese. Sally didn't like cheese. But both pizzas had cheese on them this time.
target: Sally decided to order her own pizza.

source: School was just a disaster today. It was raining and everyone got soaked in the rain. There was also a fire and everyone had to evacuate the school. I caught a fever from being in the rain for several minutes.
target: I've never had a worse day.

source: Felipe has always wanted to see the beautiful Pacific Northwest. He decided to travel to Oregon one day. In Oregon, Felipe hiked great mountains and ate delicious food. He was sad when his trip came to an end.
target: Felipe immediately started planning the next trip.

source: Ed challenged his brother to a basketball game. The two guys played a friendly match. The score was almost tied. Then Ed made a slam dunk.
target: Ed won the game.

source: Lary was a poor coal miner. Lary would work long hours every day in the mines. Lary was mining one day and saw a sparkle in the distance! Lary had found a vein of gold ore!
target: Lary was happy and excited.

source: Jim's car was ten Year's old, and started having problems. He decided to trade it in and buy a new one. He did a lot of research on the most economical cars to buy. He decided on one that could also run on a battery.
target: Jim saved a lot of money in gas by buying a battery run car.

source: Nick took his dog for a walk last Saturday. During the walk, his dog saw several other dogs. He was not well-socialized, so he started barking at them. It was a long and painful experience for both of them.

source: Earl is a grandfather for the first time today! His daughter just had her first baby and she had a girl. Earl has secretly been saving money for his new granddaughter. He surprise his daughter with a new savings account for her child.
target: His daughter now adds to it, for her daughter's college.

source: The building exploded. Five people were inside it. Three died and two lived. Mosh rushed out with his little sister in his arms.

source: My girlfriend collects stamps. Not the kind for mail but the kind to stamp things with. She has different cute ones. For her birthday I want to buy her more.
target: I bought her a rare stamp from an online seller.

source: Jake opened his fridge, looking for food. He found nothing, except some jelly. He realized he could make a PB&J sandwich. He got the ingredients, and fixed himself a sandwhich.

source: Elda had a craving for french fries. She decided to make them herself. She sliced up potatoes and dropped them in bubbling oil. Then she pulled them out when they were golden brown.
target: Elda's french fries were perfectly cooked.

source: One year, Matt was training for a half marathon. Near the time of the race, he slipped on a run and damaged his knee. Matt missed the race and required an extensive rehab. As soon as he could, Matt was back to training.

source: Susie loves her grandma's banana bread. Susie called her grandma and asked her to send some. Grandma lived very far away. A week passed and grandma surprised Susie by coming to visit.

source: Brendon used to work with mike. One day Mike moved his chair while he was standing. He went to sit down and fell. Mike couldn't help but laugh at the site.

source: Lorraine always wanted to make biscuits the way her mother used to. She decides to take a month away from work and only make biscuits. Finally she has perfected her biscuit recipe. She brings her mother a biscuit and her mother says it is delicious.

source: Jake wanted to make a YouTube account. He started vlogging. They did not get much attention. He then started doing skits.

source: I went to buy a new television last week. After finally picking one out I took it home. I noticed it was broken as soon as I got it out of the box. The screen was cracked.

source: Dennis entered a surfing competition. He did poorly at first, and he fell off a lot. Later he did much better as the competition winded down. Then he got the best wave of his life.

source: Ben's garden was not very good, because things grew, but not well. Wilson showed Ben how to make compost with grass and leaves. Ben started a compost pile in the fall with his failed plants. Ben added leaves to his compost pile and waited until spring.

source: Joe was really hungry. There was nothing in his fridge to eat. He couldn't find his phone to order carry-out. Joe ordered a pizza online.

source: Jason and his friends were gathering to watch a movie. Everyone brought something along to eat. Jason realized he had forgotten to bring something. He ran home and quickly made popcorn for the movie.

source: Jody was a very hard worker. She always did her best and often worked overtime. Jody's boss noticed her efforts and decided to give her a promotion. Her hard work had paid off!

source: Charlie would eat anything. He was small, even for a chihuahua, but he loved food. His crowning triumph was when he stole a large pizza. Dismayed, his family rushed him a mean person they called Vet.

source: My sister in law Sue was angry last week. Her boss Cara accused her of putting too many people on a shift. Sue said she did not make the schedule the day in question. She pulled the timesheets to prove her point.

source: Nora wanted to go on vacation. She decided to visit the mountain cabin. The cabin was beautiful, set in the woods, beside a stream. Nora loved to picnic by the stream.

source: Fancy is the name of Sharon's miniature schnauzer. Fancy turned 14 Year's old yesterday. Schnauzers usually don't live that long. Sharon feels lucky to have had Fancy since she was a puppy.

source: Keith lived in an area that had occasional earthquakes. But he thought keeping an first aid kit was unnecessary. The next day, he cut his hand while cutting food. And he had to drive himself to a hospital.
target: Keith's car then skidded off the road when an earthquake struck.

source: Sean wanted to go out for a picnic. He packed himself a lunch in a basket. Then, he rode his bike off to a field. In the field, he ate his picnic.

source: The parents were beyond delighted by the birth of their daughter. They named her Joy. About two Year's later they had their second child, a boy. While happy and grateful, they were somewhat less enthused.

source: Chris wanted a pack of gum, but he didn't have any money. He decided to steal the gum from the store. The store owner caught Chris stealing the gum, and he got in trouble. Chris felt terrible.

source: Neil took a flight into Bangkok. He walked around to see the sights. There were so many delicious local foods! And the souvenirs were wonderful, too!

source: Mike is a cop who got shot in the leg. He had never gotten shot before, it made him think about life. He didn't know if he would go back to work. He saw the crime on the news that night.

source: Tracy never believed in marriage. Doug taught Tracy how to feel love again. Doug and Tracy made a commitment to each other. Doug broke his wedding vows to Tracy.

source: Sky went to Turkey with her class. She landed in Istanbul and started sightseeing. All the students loved the architecture. And they thought the food was great too!

source: Joe and Mary invited friends over for dinner. The gathered in the kitchen and prepared pizza. As the pizza cooked, the couples got board games. The played games for hours.

source: The upstairs neighbors are always stomping around. Even late at night. They're almost always home. I tried talking to them about it and they said they'd be quieter.

source: Francisco is jealous of all his friends who go skiing in the winter. He decides he wants to ski too. Francisco works with an instructor to learn how to ski. He practices very hard.

source: Sai normally hated picture days at school. They were tedious and he never looked as nice as some other kids. To try and help Sai feel better, his mom bought him a new sweater. Sai wore the sweater to picture day and got a lot of compliments.

source: The girls went to a bar. They opened a tab. They had a few drinks. They finally decided to close their tab.

source: Bryan was shopping for fruit for his family. He looked through the whole aisle but could not decide on a fruit. His wife hated grapes, his daughter hated apples. Even his son was a fussy fruit eater!
target: Bryan decided to buy bananas.

source: Emily took her child to the zoo. The saw many animals, including lions. Her child was very afraid of the lions. He started to scream and cry.
target: Emily picked up her child to comfort him.

source: Kim could have a puppy if she scored a basket in the game. She practiced all day at home. She practiced in the gym after school with her team. Finally it was the day of the big game.
target: Kim scored a basket and got a puppy.

source: Karen was a softball player. Her team wasn't doing very well. Her coach gave them a very inspiring speech. Everyone started to practice and work much harder.
target: Karen improved with the team.

source: Kayla hadn't been to a social event in nearly three Year's. She was suffering from crippling anxiety. The longer she went without interacting, the more difficult it became. Her brother was nervous for her and took her to a therapist.
target: Kayla told the therapist she was suicidal and asked for help.

source: Ricky fell while hiking in the woods. He was terrified! He thought he had fallen into a patch of poison ivy. Then he used his nature guide to identify the plant.
target: He was relieved to find out he was wrong.

source: My husband loves Blue Belle ice cream. Not too long ago, Blue Belle had a recall and quit producing. My son works at Kroger, they recently had a meeting about Blue Belle. Blue Belle ice cream arrived at Kroger last week.
target: My husband is so grateful!

source: Oni had never performed before an audience. But he entered the talent show hoping to win the grand prize. He thought he would just give it his best try. Oni sang in the show and everyone applauded.
target: Oni won the talent show with his awesome singing.

source: Ralph hates shopping. His mom makes him go. They are there for a long time. Ralph helps his mom load and unload the groceries.
target: He is surprised when his mom gives him money for helping.

source: Kayla borrowed a book from her sister. She brought the book with her to a coffee shop to read. Kayla accidentally spilled some of her vanilla latte on the book. She immediately went home to inform her sister.
target: Her sister was mad!

source: Lenny wanted to watch a movie. He drove to the local Hollywood video. Lenny rented three horror movies. Lenny went next door and bought a pizza from a shop.
target: He went back home and binge watched all of his movies.

source: Laura told a story of burning bras in the 60's. The crowd went wild after learning this personal information. Laura assured the crowd that was long ago. She put her bid in for President.
target: Laura then became elected by the country.

source: Charlie wanted to be a police officer in Hawaii. He passed his tests and was hired in Honolulu. Charlie liked interacting with the community. Charlie didn't like the amount of corruption in the force.
target: Charlie vowed to change things if he was ever made chief.

source: I had two dogs that were very close. The older dog got very sick and was put to sleep. The younger dog was very lonely. We have a neighbor dog come over to play.
target: Our dog feels much better playing with another dog.

source: Sean's roommates notice that his clothes and bed start to smell. They tell him he needs to clean his laundry pretty soon. Sean protests at first, but finally he cleans his laundry. His roommates are grateful that Sean no longer smells as bad.
target: They tell him to never wait so long to do laundry again.

source: My friend wants to be a doctor, so she took the MCAT. The first time she took it, she did not get a good enough score. She studied very hard and took it again. This time, she did very well!
target: We took her out to drinks to celebrate.

source: Kelly went down to the ocean to relax. She immediately went and put her feet in. As she put her feet in however, the wave captured her. Her clothes got soaked.
target: Kelly went home to change into dry clothes.

source: Ben was excited to go fishing with his grandfather for the first time. However, he found putting the worms on the hook to be disgusting. He accidentally pricked his finger with one of the hooks, too. Ben soon realized that fishing was not for him.
target: Ben asked his grandfather if they could watch a movie instead.

source: Amelia was getting ready for a date at a nice Italian restaurant. Amelia's friend had set her up on a blind date a week prior. She got to the restaurant early and waited for her date. Thirty minutes had passed and her date did not show up.
target: Amelia went back home.

source: The mom really wanted to get the boy's picture with Santa. The boy was scared and refused. The mom told the boy that Santa was responsible for bringing presents. This changed the boy's mind.
target: The boy hoped to get lots of presents from Santa!

source: Stewart tried to finish his favorite task before going to bed. He got so engrossed in it, he forgot to keep the fire going. Shivering, he pulled a bunch of blankets around himself. He became very warm and content.
target: When he woke up it was freezing.

source: Anthony wanted to learn how to speak Spanish. He found an online Spanish course, and he enrolled. Anthony studied hard, and eventually he learned the language. Anthony speaks Spanish fluently now.
target: Anthony became successful because of his linguistic abilities.

source: Amy went to the grocery store after work. She had a short list of items to buy. The store was out of half the items. Amy had to go to a second grocery store.
target: After that she was able to go home and cook a good meal.

source: Joanie got ready to blow dry her hair for a date. She was upset to find her blow dryer missing. Then, Joanie heard a familiar sound coming from outside. She saw her brother using the blow dryer.
target: Joanie ran outside to confront her brother.

source: Cornelia decides that she wants to rearrange her apartment. Her bed has stood next to the wall for many Year's. Cornelia moves her bed to sit next to the window. When her friends sees her new arrangement, they love it.
target: Soon all her friends had arranged their beds the same way.

source: Tim loved his motorcycle. He rode it whenever he could. Up until last week when he wrecked. Now he almost never rides it.
target: Tim is scared to ride his motorcycle.

source: Wendy landed her first job as a nurse at a nursing home. She really loved her job and connected with the residents. She really enjoyed talking to a little old lady in particular. One day, the lady showed her pictures of her children.
target: Wendy enjoyed seeing the photos.

source: Tom and Jake went to a concert. They were seeing this band they love. They went into the general admission area. Some very tall people were standing so they couldn't see a thing.
target: Tom and Jake then could not see their favorite band.

source: Lester was proud that he had spent Years without a cell phone. He liked to think he was less dependent on technology than others. However, one day his car had a flat tire and he wished he had a phone. He did not want to have an experience like that again.
target: Lester went out and got the best cell phone he could afford.

source: Ben needed an oil change in his car. He knew they were quite expensive. Then he saw a coupon in the paper. Ben cut it out and took it to the garage.
target: Ben was able to get his oil changed.

source: I woke up hungry. I poured a bowl of cereal but found I did not have any milk. After contemplating using water I decided to go to the store. I walked to the corner and got a half gallon of 2%.
target: I came home and ate cereal.

source: Anna had a saltwater fish tank. She only kept coral in it. Then she decided she wanted some fish, too. She bought a few small clownfish and triggers.
target: Now Anna has a diverse tank with fish and coral.

source: Holly was a beautiful black cat that Lee loved very much. Saddly, Holy got very sick and Lee had to put her to sleep. Lee was very sad missing Holly everyday. One day soon after a little black kitten showed up at Lee's back door.
target: Lee decided to adopt the kitten.

source: Bob needed a new pair of socks. He went to the local department store to buy them. The store was having a big sale. He found himself buying lots of great stuff.
target: Bob really enjoyed his shopping trip.

source: Young Reggie loved playing and watching american football. His favorite player was running back Jamal Lewis. He was at the Salt Lake Airport with his family and saw his hero. He went up to him saying that he will also play professional football.
target: Jamal Lewis gave him personal advice and wished him the best.

source: Ella found a tiny robin on the ground. She knew it must have fallen from its nest. She wrapped it carefully and made it a safe home. Then she fed it worms by hand.
target: She liked taking care of the robin.

source: I made a resolution to quit my job. I wrote my letter of resignation. I quietly went to the office and turned it in. I quit my job.
target: I'm now free to pursue a career that will make me happy.

source: I put the black plastic rose in a vase with water. I left it atop my bookcase for a few weeks. Ten people asked me about it. They wanted to know why I had a watered, fake flower.
target: Honestly, I didn't really know why either.

source: Ben decided to treat himself to a coffee. He paid for the coffee using his debit card. Later, the bank called him saying he over-drafted. They explained that he had to pay a thirty dollar charge.
target: Ben was frustrated at the extra charge.

source: Chris was on his second layover of the week. Pacing around the airport, he decided he would make use of this time. Installing an app on his phone, he began practicing his french. Another patron of the airport overheard him and offered him assistance
target: The patron helped teach Chris how to speak basic French.

source: When I was a kid, Google started for the first time. I remember asking my dad how to use the site. He showed me how to type and search anything I wanted. I became enthralled, and spent every day at my desk having fun.
target: I learned a lot from Google.

source: Jeff was up for a promotion in which he would have to interview for. He went home and studied real hard, memorizing his answers. He prepped for many days until he felt prepared for the interview. He went in for his interview and passed with flying colors!
target: He was pleased when he was given the promotion.

source: Ritz was born in a large litter of 12 other puppies. When he was eight weeks old he was given away to a lovely family. They raised him well and he led a very happy life. Things changed one day for Ritz when his owner got cancer.
target: Ritz was orphaned and had to be sent to a shelter.

source: Mia loved being outdoors. One summer, she decided to go mountain climbing. She joined a club of people who climbed mountains together. They climbed the tallest mountain in her area.
target: Mia had a great time.

source: Fred's boss called him into the office at the propane filling station. He told Fred that times were tough and he had to be laid off. Fred became very angry about this. He picked up his boss by the collar and threw him down.
target: Fred's coworker who saw him assault his boss called the police.

source: My sister in law is trying to save money. She is a recent widow living on a pension. She recently returned two of three cable boxes. I told her that antennas work well now that broadcasts are HD.
target: She was glad to hear that.

source: Victor has always prided himself on trying new foods. However, he has never eaten a pistachio. One day he buys a jar of pistachios to eat at home. He loves how they taste.
target: Victor decides to start buying pistachios regularly.

source: Sharon had kept a bag of unknown seeds for Years. She decided one day to plant the seeds. Sharon put them in planters, believing they would be small plants. Sharon couldn't have been more wrong in her assumption!
target: They ended up being huge plants.

source: It was a gorgeous day outside. Emily wanted to take advantage of the great weather. She decided to go to the park. Emily was disappointed when she found out her car wouldn't start.
target: She asked her neighbor for a jump-start.

source: Tom was tired of everyday life. So, he decided to move off the grid. His first week was ok, but soon he ran out of water. He suffered for two days and still couldn't find any.
target: Eventually Tom went back on the grid.

source: Tim wanted to learn astronomy. He wanted to go into outer space. However he was to young to be an astronaut. This news made him sad.
target: Tim worked hard in school to become one.

source: My sister in law works in an assisted living center. She is a waitress. She gave us a calendar issued by the center. It showed her dressed up for Saint Patrick's Day.
target: We all thought my sister looked hilarious dressed up that way.

source: Fred decided to buy some shares of Apple. The stock price was 90 dollars when he bought it. Luckily they had great earnings yesterday. The stock then went up to 100 dollars.
target: Fred was very happy.

source: Jen was so confident in her preparations for the county spelling bee. She had spent the past month studying the dictionary every night. When the Bee started, Jen survived as others got knocked out. It all came down to the final two and Jen's opponent had messed up.
target: Jen won the spelling bee!

source: Kelly hasn't left her apartment in years. I went up to her place today to say hello. I could tell she was reluctant to let me in. We talked for a while about how she's doing.
target: Kelly is agoraphobic.

source: Emily was at the beach. The weather started out tranquil. Suddenly the wind began to pick up severely. Anna was caught in a scary sandstorm!
target: She was fortunately able to get back to the beach house safely.

source: Andrew had never been in trouble for anything. His parents were out of town for the week. Andrew's friends came over and wanted to drink. So Andrew took out his parents secret stash of alcohol.
target: They drank the alcohol and got drunk.

source: Ellen used to live in the country. She misses having days with the power out. One day an ice storm caused the power to go out in her city home. She got very cold.
target: She was happy when the power came back on.

source: Jose was excited. He had just gotten a new skateboard and wanted to try it out. He took it straight to the skatepark. He skated all day.
target: Jose had fun at the skatepark.

source: Mike was sitting at his desk. But suddenly, he felt a strange itching sensation on his arm. He felt his legs become itchy too. And then his face.
target: Mike had a stroke.

source: Jill went on a road trip last month. She wanted to travel from Boston to Seattle. Halfway through, her car broke down. She spent hours on the side of the road, waiting for AAA.
target: They fixed her car and sent her on her way.

source: The principal announced there would be a school dance that Friday. Mary became excited about the dance. She wanted Dan to ask her to the school dance. Dan saw Mary in the hallway and told her he needed to talk to her.
target: She was happy he asked her to the dance.

source: A new Organic Avenue store opened up in NYC and I checked it out. I was super excited to try it because I never went before. As I walked in, they had amazing salads and juices to try. I tried a summer salad and coconut water.
target: This was my new favorite restaurant.

source: Cindy's room had white walls. But she complained that they reflected too much light. So she decided to have her walls painted blue. She thought her room was more calming.
target: She was pleased with the results.

source: I joined a fantasy football league for the first time this year. I joined my buddy's group because they needed one more person. I've never played before in my life. I ended up winning first place!
target: I was very excited.

source: Helen got up for work early. It snowed the night before so she had to shovel her car out. It took her an hour to clear the snow. Heading back in the house to get ready, she heard a familiar sound.
target: She had left the shower running.

source: After the state basketball championship reporters interviewed the team. Dan asked if this was live or recorded. The journalist informed him it was a live show. Dan said to the camera his father was his inspiration.
target: Dan admired his father.

source: Jeremy has a distinct and strong personality. He had a bad time with his job and got fired. He spoke some unflattering things to his manager and co-workers. Since then, he's found it difficult to find a job.
target: Jeremy has a difficult manner for the workplace.

source: Fran bought a house on the beach. Everyday the cranes would feed off of the bugs in her yard. One day though the cranes stopped coming around. Several months went by and still no cranes
target: Fran's yard is now overrun with bugs.

source: Our team had a football game today. We were all pumped to win. We got on the field and practiced before the game. Our team was unified, and worked together.
target: Our team felt gratified.

source: Kelly hated math class and struggled to learn the concepts. She struggled a lot with the work and often sought help from teachers. She worked very hard and it paid off with good grades. She was entering college in the fall.
target: Kelly graduated with good grades.

source: Sophie's nana was terminally ill. Sophie visited her in the hospital to say goodbye. Her nana gave Sophie her prized gold locket. She told Sophie to keep it to remember her by.
target: Sophie cried.

source: Kelly had a new job interview today. She got ready in ten minutes and raced out the door. When she got there and met with the woman, she answered questions. When the interview was done, they told her they would call her back.
target: Kelly hoped that she would get a call soon.

source: Don noticed a fly go into the living room. He decided to swat it. He tried for half an hour but it kept evading him. Eventually the fly flew out on its own.
target: Don closed the door it flew out of.

source: Zack and his friends passed a scary house on their walks to school. One day, they decided to go inside it. Zack and his friends went inside every room. The house was old and abandoned.
target: They left and went to school.

source: Mia went to the casino last night. She began the night by playing some poker. After losing a considerable amount of money, she played slots. She was nearly out of money when the herd RING RING RING.
target: Mia won a jackpot!

source: Portia loves walking through the woods nearby her house. However, she notices that her sneakers are becoming muddy and gross. She decides to buy a pair of hiking boots. Portia finds a pair that is comfortable and not too expensive.
target: She is happy with her selection.

source: Andrew was getting married tomorrow. He had bought the wedding ring months before and couldn't find it! He looked everywhere in his house. Finally he remembered that it was back at the store to get resized.
target: Andrew was so relieved.

source: Terry found 2 hundred dollars at work. He took the money home but he wondered if he did the right thing. The next day he took the money to work and turned it in. After a week no one claimed the money so his boss gave it back to him.
target: He learned that honesty pays.

source: I love taking long warm showers. They feel great and they're fun. Unfortunately they're wasteful. So I always feel bad when I take one.
target: I decided to only take one long warm shower per week.

source: Barry loves playing baseball. Barry decided that he would go and watch a professional game. Barry went to the stadium, and purchased a ticket. Upon entering, Barry decided to grab a beer to drink.
target: Barry also bought a hot dog.

source: We had fruit flies in our home last year. We looked up various treatments. We tried red wine in bowls. When that didn't work we bought a special trap.
target: We could even see the trap working.

source: Remy liked to drink milk. But one day, she spilled milk all over her carpet. And she didn't think bother to clean the spill properly. The next morning, she woke up to a terrible smell.
target: Remy learned to never spill milk on carpet and to clean better.

source: Heather and Marcus were ready for the next step in their relationship. They were happy newlyweds, but wanted an addition to their family. Although not quite ready for kids, they still felt lonely. On a whim, they went to an animal shelter and fell in love with a cat.
target: They adopted the cat.

source: Lots of people were walking to class. They all wanted to get there fast. People started pushing others out of the way. They fell down.
target: The crowd made many people late to class.

source: Last Saturday I went to an Azalea concert. The concert was amazing. I got to be in the front row. After the show I went backstage to meet her.
target: Azalea was very cool.

source: Eric has always been overweight. His new year's resolution was to stick to a diet. He went to the gym in January and ate healthier. That last about a month.
target: Eric then gave up working out.

source: Sally was struggling to do well in school. Her parents decided they needed to motivate her. They said if she did well her last semester, she picks the vacation. Sally studied night and day, she wanted to do well.
target: Sally did well, and her parents agreed to take her to Hawaii.

source: When I was a kid, my siblings and I needed money. We came up with the idea for a lemonade stand. We decided to set up outside our house. We sold lemonade to a few dozen people.
target: We made a lot of money for our needs.

source: I loved flashlights as a kid. When I got older I bought small clip on flashlights. I put them on my bag to use in case of emergencies. Later, the advent of the smartphone made flashlights less needed.
target: My house is now full of flashlights I don't know what to do with.

source: Terry hated his name. He wanted a cool name like Super Metro Volcano Man. He told his mother he wanted to change his name. His mother explained that he was named after his loving grandfather.
target: Terry was still disappointed.

source: The Parker family was looking for a new house. They looked all over town but couldn't find a home they wanted. Finally they found a beautiful home they loved. The home was absolutely gorgeous.
target: The Parker family soon moved into their new home.

source: Tom decided to drive to his girlfriend's house today. He drove as fast as he can although there was a lot of traffic. When he got into the front of the house, he rang the doorbell. No one answered however, the front door was open.
target: Tom began to worry.

source: Kelly's car battery died. She tried to have it jumped but it didn't work. Eventually she took it to the auto store. They checked it for her and it was dead.
target: Kelly reluctantly paid for a new battery.

source: Joe bought a skateboard with his savings. He took his new skateboard to the park to show it off to his friends. While doing a trick, Joe fell and broke his arm. He spent four hours at the hospital getting his arm set.
target: Joe was in terrible pain.

source: Maddie decided it was time for back to school shopping. It was mid August and classes were beginning soon. She looked up her course requirements and shopping lists. Than, she looked through all the ads in the paper for the best deals.
target: She found the best places to shop and purchase all her supplies.

source: Neil had enjoyed Chinese food in Hunan. But he was told the spicier food was in Szechuan province. Intrigued, he took a train there. Then he ordered a plate of rice and noodles.
target: He felt like his mouth was on fire.

source: I spent most of my detention time sleeping class. My teacher told me to wake up since no sleeping was aloud. I tried to remain awake and work on a few assignments. When my teacher escorted me out of the class, I was happy.
target: When I got home I went right to bed.

source: Amanda was watching a squirrel collect acorns. Amanda was fascinated with how efficient the squirrel was. Amanda watched the squirrel as he carried the acorns to his nest. Amanda also saw how the squirrel was very watchful over the acorns.
target: Amanda enjoys learning about nature.

source: Terry loves to swim but he never learned how to dive. He always jumps in the water feet first. This summer Terry decides he wants to learn how to dive in the water. He practices diving very hard every day.
target: Terry hope to improve.

source: Peter was excited for the class field trip. He was looking forward to visiting the science museum. The place had many cool exhibits and interactive displays. Peter was fascinated by the physics and space demonstrations.
target: Peter grew up to be a scientist.

source: Kaylee went to work at Cedar Point, the amusement park. While working at Cedar Point, she met James. Kaylee and James started to like each other and soon started dating. One year later, James proposed to Kaylee.
target: Kaylee and James were married in the fall.

source: Joanie was interviewing for her first job. She was very nervous. She really wanted to get the position at the ice cream shop. She thought the interview went pretty well.
target: The next day she got a call and was offered the job.

source: Ana was a hardworking mom. One day she booked herself an afternoon at a spa. She had her whole body massaged. She even had hydrotherapy sessions.
target: She felt magnificently relaxed and contented afterwards.

source: Bob was a worker on Mechanical Turk. He got a fifty dollar bonus. Bob was happy because it was the biggest bonus he had gotten. Bob put on his glasses and realized it was actually five dollars.
target: Bob was still happy, but less excited.

source: Mom didn't want to cook dinner tonight. We were all very hungry. She told us to fend for ourselves. We ate cold cereal for dinner tonight.
target: We were all very upset.

source: Mary's family was getting together for a holiday dinner at the club. Everyone was going to be there except for Mary's Grandfather. Mary was sad that the whole family would not be together. When she got to the club, she was surprised to see her grandfather!
target: Mary was so happy!

source: The children were inside playing when they heard music. They ran to their mother and begged for change. She handed them a couple of dollars. They took off running outside, catching up to the ice cream truck.
target: The children excitedly bought ice cream cones.

source: We wanted to go to the beach one weekend. After discussing it, we didn't want to drive. We proceeded to look online for an airplane ticket. After purchasing a cheap ticket, we headed to the airport.
target: We boarded a flight to the beach.

source: Susan woke up early. She had to feed the animals before work. She found that her rabbit had bunnies. Susan was very pleased at the sight of them.
target: Susan took good care of them.

source: I always try to go to bed on time. Last night I was hooked watching a new tv show. Before I knew it it was really late. I should have been asleep hours ago.
target: The television show had hooked me in.

source: Howard was feeling happy one morning. He decided to spend all day enjoying his life. All day, while at work, he complimented his coworkers. When he got home, he took his family to see a movie and have dinner.
target: Howard was happy to have had such a good day.

source: A man arrived at a construction site for his job. He put on his hardhat, grabbed his tools and walked into the site. While he was walking, a large brick fell and hit him on the head. The man was knocked out, and his co workers ran to help him.
target: His coworkers took him to safety and called their medic.

source: Trent's family owned a camping supply store. Trent hated camping though. Every summer his parents made him go on a camping trip. This summer Trent was in charge of keeping the fire going in the wind.
target: Trent was careless and caused a huge fire.

source: George decided to buy a TV. He found a very nice TV that he wanted and went to pick it up. A few days later, George awoke to a surprise. His TV had been stolen.
target: He told the police, who said they weren't likely to find it.

source: Tommy was 17 when he dyed his hair pink. He thought it was punk and cool. Some of his friends agreed. His parents thought it was stupid.
target: They made Tommy shave his head.

source: Robbie was looking for help shoveling her car out of the snow. She posted on Facebook, hoping somebody would see. Cameron saw the post, and felt sympathy for Robbie and her car. Since he had the day off work, Cameron said he could help.
target: Cameron came by and helped Robbie shovel.

source: Ronald kicked his shoes off and laid on the couch for a nap. When he woke up, he went to put his shoes on. But he couldn't lace them up because the strings were missing! He looked all over but couldn't find them.
target: Ronald went to look for more laces.

source: Sara learned that she was expecting a child. She made it through the nine months of pregnancy. One day her water broke and she was taken to the hospital. Sara was in labor for 4 hours.
target: Sara had a baby boy.

source: Last year my uncle bought a metal detector. He takes it to the beach every weekend. A few months ago he found a Rolex. It was worth a few hundred dollars.
target: My uncle enjoys his hobby.

source: I went to babysit my 5-year-old nephew in San Francisco. My sister encouraged me to bike her kid to school. I was afraid to bike across the city with my nephew in tow. Instead, we biked through Golden Gate Park to the beach and the zoo.
target: We had a great time!

source: Alice's friends invited her out to lunch. She drove out to meet them at a restaurant. Her friends were waiting at a table but had already ordered. By the time she had her food, they were already done eating.
target: Alice felt her friends were slightly thoughtless.

source: My children and I visited the local animal shelter. We looked at puppies and kittens in their cages. My daughters picked out a friendly puppy. They played with her and rubbed her belly.
target: I adopted the puppy for my daughter.

source: Mario got up out of bed. Today was his wedding day and he already felt the butterflies. He shaved and showered happily. He got dressed and went to the church.
target: It was the best day of his life.

source: Zeke was tired of living in America. He decided to move to Cozumel. He went to the Cozumel beach and bought some land. Zeke decided to build a house on that land.
target: Zeke lived out his life very happy.

source: Kelly wanted to be in the Navy. She asked a recruiter about it. He advised her to complete an application. She filled it out and submitted it.
target: The navy got back to her promptly.

source: Gina was in the lunch room at her new school. She only knew 2 people in the whole school. Neither of them was in this lunch room. She got her food and went outside.
target: Gina felt very lonely.

source: Today we went on a plane ride. The plane was very big, I was scared. When we got on the plane Mom told me it will be fun. The plane made a lot of loud noises but it wasn't too bad.
target: I am no longer afraid of planes.

source: Adam needed a new baseball cap. He looked online at different hats. He selected the perfect hat and ordered it. He was so excited to receive it.
target: And he opened it as soon as it got there.

source: Ted and Beth are planning a wedding together. They noticed that they may not have enough to pay for it. Ted asked his parents to help pay and they agreed. Beth did the same with her parents and got some extra money too.
target: Their parents love them.

source: Cindy got out of bed. But she couldn't find her slippers. Instead of making breakfast, spent all day looking for them. She gave up and ordered another pair.
target: Luckily, the new ones were more comfortable than the old ones.

source: Neil had just arrived in Paris. He could not wait to see all the culture there! He spend his first day seeing art work. He visited three museums in just one day!
target: Neil felt very happy and satisfied that he'd been able to visit.

source: Jessica was getting ready to graduate from college. She worked very hard in school and thought she deserved a reward. Her father knew that Jessica wanted a vacation. On her graduation day, Jessica's father surprised her with tickets.
target: Jessica was very happy.

source: Tim was too tall for all of his pants. He could not find a good outfit to wear for his trip to the park! Everything made his legs look too long, and silly. Then he decided to cut his jeans into shorts.
target: Tim wore the jean-shorts to the park.

source: Sandy had purchased a new bed. She needed to clean her room before the delivery men arrived. She also needed to get rid of her old bed. Her friend Jim wanted her old bed.
target: Sandy sold Jim her old bed.

source: In college, I had some terrible professors. They did not know how to teach the students. So, I learned to teach myself on my own. Instead of going to class, I went to the library and did exactly that.
target: Teaching myself helped me get ahead of other students.

source: Timmy knew about this cute girl he went to school with. He followed her home one day. She stopped at a corner as he was following her. Timmy realized he had been caught, and was not sure what to do.
target: He said hello and they began talking.

source: Neil was visiting Egypt. He took a tour to see the Great Pyramids. He stared up at them in awe. They were so huge and ornate!
target: Neil was fascinated by the scale and beauty of the pyramids.

source: Jen fell asleep with bleach in her hair. She only meant to leave it in for about 5 minutes, not nearly an hour. When she rinsed it out her hair was white with a blue tinge. She was in a panic but her mother said they could fix it.
target: Jen's mother fixed Jen's discolored hair.

source: Doug was sad it was Christmas Eve and there was no snow. All Doug wanted was a white Christmas. He prayed to God for snow and went to sleep. When he woke up the next morning the room was filled with light.
target: Doug looked out the window and saw a blanket of white snow.

source: Sheryl worked as a museum curator. Her family told her she worked a boring job. She tried to tell them that she got to work with living history. She tried to tell that their office jobs were a whole lot worse.
target: Sheryl was proud of her job as a museum curator.

source: Joe stretched as he rolled over in bed. His clock showed it was 10 am. He jumped out of bed, panicked. His alarm hadn't gone off.
target: Joe was late for work.

source: Ned's wife said he'd passed away quietly in his sleep. His wife told all her friends she hadn't known he was ill. She swore it was the weirdest thing she'd ever seen. The police didn't buy her story and arrested her.
target: She hired a defense attorney.

source: Jackie was admitted into the hospital today. Her baby is about to become born. Her husband came from work to comfort her. After 48 hours of being in labor, her baby was released.
target: Jackie and her husband were very happy.

source: My family wanted a pet. We went to the pet store on Saturday. We saw lots of dogs and kittens. We fell in love with a cute black kitten.
target: We bought the kitten.

source: Joe's sister was always having her tests put up on the refrigerator. She got As all the time. Joe didn't ever get As. So he was proud when he came home with an A on his spelling homework.
target: His sister congratulated him.

source: Adam and Angel wanted to move out and get a place of their own. They searched for apartments online for weeks. They found a few apartments they liked quite a bit. They went and looked at the apartments they had chosen.
target: Finally they decided on an apartment.

source: Greta was turning ten Year's old. She wanted to throw a birthday party. Greta handed out invitations for the party at school. When the day of the party came, no one showed up.
target: Greta was very sad, but her parents cheered her up.

source: Shari was worried. Her wedding was tomorrow, and it was an outdoor ceremony. But rain was forecast! Thankfully, the wedding day dawned clear and sunny after all.
target: The festivities went on without a hitch.

source: Amy was excited it was Christmas Eve. She had been very good all year. She gave the list of her favorite toys to Santa at the mall. He told her she would receive everything she wanted.
target: On Christmas, Amy got exactly what she hoped to get.

source: Anna had been tending her garden all summer. She went outside to harvest. All her fruits and veggies were ready! She picked them one by one.
target: She had a bountiful harvest.

source: Kim had dropped her toothbrush in the toilet. She was disgusted by the thought of putting her hand in to pull it out. She grabbed a pair of scissors out of the drawer. Each time she had the toothbrush she would drop it.
target: Kim decided this was a sign to buy a new toothbrush.

source: Hannah's parents signed her up for piano lessons. After her first piano lesson, Hannah felt discouraged. She tried to practice as hard as she could. Hannah could not get her fingers to work properly.
target: Hannah gave up the piano.

source: Keira found a man she thought was a keeper. He had a great job, impressive house, and paid for all their dates. A few months into dating, Keira started planning her wedding dress. And then he hit her because she burned dinner.
target: Keira cannot stay with this abusive man.

source: The shepherd opened the gate of the pen. He sent his dog into the pasture to round up the sheep. The dog herded the sheep towards the gate. The sheep moved together into the pen.
target: The shepherd then went back to his house.

source: Walter was lonely ever since his wife had passed away. He met a nice lady at bingo and became friendly with her. He felt guilty though about what his late wife might think. Walter had a vivid dream in which his late wife reassured him.
target: He asked the lady from bingo to go to dinner with him.

source: Marina was walking past the library. She put her face down to avoid the harsh wind coming towards her face. All of a sudden a tumbleweed hit Marina's legs really hard. She looked down towards her legs but became disoriented.
target: She couldn't believe how windy it was.

source: Yesterday I played the Powerball game. I picked my numbers from our family's bible. I purchased my tickets from a reputable online lottery agent. I prayed nervously as the winning numbers were drawn.
target: I didn't win.

source: Amy is enrolled in an advanced Plant Biology course. She has a test next week about Photosynthesis. The information is complex and in depth. She wrote a song about it to memorize the material more easily.
target: Her song helped her and she then did well.

source: Coming out of College, I was so nervous to start work. I could barely sleep the week before my start date. The day of, I was nauseous and jittery. However, a congratulatory text from my parents cheered me up.
target: I had a great first day of work.

source: Seven-year-old Ben went to play at his friend Mike's house. Mike greeted Ben, and they went to play in Mike's room. First, they played with Mike's quadcopters for a long time. Then, they played with some trucks.
target: They had a good time together.

source: A waiter was dying to go home but he still had a table eating. The waiter printed out the bill and slipped it on the table. The guests noticed the bill after a while and took a hint. They paid for the bill and left.
target: Gratefully, the waiter left for the evening.

source: Kay was moving back in with her mom. She sadly packed her things and drove to her mom's house. Her mother helped her unpack her car. There was no enough room for Kay's things.
target: Kay had to put some of her things in storage.

source: The girls decided to get together for dinner. They brought their families too. Unfortunately they got into a fight. The staff had to throw them out.
target: The girls were thoroughly embarrassed.

source: Vinny had always hoped to meet a real life movie star. His friends told him it was very tough to meet a movie star. However, he did not give up hope. One day Vinny saw Denzel Washington out taking a stroll.
target: Vinny got his picture taken with him.

source: When I was seven years old, I went swimming with some friends. I did not know how to swim in deep water. By accident, I slipped into the deep part of the pool. I thought I was going to drown!
target: A lifeguard jumped in and pulled me out of the deep end.

source: The Smith's could not find their cat. They were afraid she had gotten outside and gotten lost. Everyone was sad when they sat down in front of the Christmas tree. Then they noticed her looking down at them from the top branches.
target: The Smiths all cheered, and rushed to hug their cat.

source: Instead of going to college right away, Flora went abroad. She visited many European countries and met a lot of people. When she was supposed to go home, she decided to stay in Spain. She got a job as a tutor and had a lot of great adventures.
target: Flora visited her parents every Summer to tell them her stories.

source: Joyce bought some fruit a week ago. It was part of her new year's resolution to be healthier. She forgot about it after a few days. Eventually a really bad smell took over her apartment.
target: Joyce threw the fruit away.

source: Ted and some of his friends went to the lake one afternoon. Ted's friends kept asking him to get in the water with them. Ted didn't know how to swim. Ted decided there was no better time to learn, so he jumped in.
target: Ted almost drowned but was saved by his friends.

source: I asked Sarah out on a date. She said yes. I was so excited for our date together. We went to dinner and then a movie.
target: I got to kiss Sarah goodnight.

source: One day, I went to the zoo with my friends. I heard the zoo had sloths, and I had always wanted to see them. We visited almost all of the exhibits, but did not see any sloths. We finally found the sloths in the very last exhibit.
target: We were gratified.

source: A scientist discovers that there is a disease beginning to spread. He works on a cure for the disease in his lab. Other scientists gather to help him with his work. Several weeks go by and they manage to develop a cure.
target: They save the world.

source: Troy went over to play at Sam's house. The boys played with blocks and trucks and teddy bears. They also colored and played with finger paints. Sam's dad made them a snack of apples and caramel sauce.
target: Troy had lots of fun at Sam's house.

source: Yvonne had always been overweight. For New Year's she made a resolution to start exercising. She began jogging everyday. In two months she had lost 23 pounds.
target: Yvonne was proud of herself.

source: India wanted to try Iced Coffee. India decided to make her own Iced Coffee at home. India prepared the coffee in the machine for the beverage. India then grabbed the milk and ice for the beverage.
target: When she finished the preparation, she consumed the yummy drink.

source: Betsy wanted a puppy, but her mom said no. Betsy was so sad and disappointed because she really wanted a pet. One day she went into her room and found a hamster in a cage. Her mom had gotten her a pet after all!
target: Betsy was really excited.

source: Maureen has always wanted to become a Biology teacher. She studies very hard to become an expert in Biology. Her friends tell her that Biology is too tough for her. However, she continues until she has her degree.
target: Now Maureen shares her passion for Biology with students.

source: Cornelia had always loved working with her hands. She decided she wanted to try building a table by herself. She took a woodworking course to learn how to build it. After finishing the course, Cornelia built a beautiful table.
target: Cornelia  uses it as a nightstand in her room.

source: The kids went to the graveyard. The came upon a grave with chains. Some of the chains had been broken. They became scared and ran.
target: They didn't want to go there again.

source: Bo and Jim wanted to drive fast. They took their cars to the salt flats in Utah. Bo hopped in his Mustang and Jim hopped in his Corvette. They raced each other for seven miles.
target: Jim won the race in his Corvette.

source: Today Sally went for a hike. She loved walking through the woods. She saw a beautiful robin in her nest. Sally loves robins.
target: She was excited.

source: Joy's boyfriend took her to play putt putt. He didn't realize she had been playing golf since she was a child. She had three holes in one during their game. She beat him by 18 points!
target: He laughed and asked for a re-match.

source: My nephew is a professional chef. While cooking for us at our house he decided to show off a bit. We videoed as he sliced an onion behind his back. We were amazed how quickly he chopped and didn't get cut.
target: He is a fantastic chef.

source: The little sister found out she was having a baby brother. She was excited until she found out she would no longer be the baby. Then she started acting out. She colored on the walls.
target: The little sister got punished with a timeout.

source: I went on a hiking trip this summer. I went to go hike away from the campsite by myself. I got lost because I did not have any equipment on me. I walked for miles searching for my friends.
target: Eventually I found some trail markers.

source: Hailey was participating in her school marathon. However she forgot to bring her running shoes. Hailey was still determined. She asked her teacher if she could borrow her's for the day.
target: The teacher admired Haley's passion and agreed.

source: Jim was mowing the yard when his mower got stuck on some metal. Jim looked closely at the metal and saw that it looked like jewelry. He took the piece of metal to an appraiser. The appraiser told him it was an old ring from an older civilization.
target: Jim sold the ring for 1000 dollars.

source: Kyle and Ted were in a pie eating contest. They sat down together in front of their pies. When the contest started, they dug in. Both of them got horrible stomach aches.
target: Kyle and Ted got so sick that they both lost.

source: Bob was playing volleyball. He suddenly felt very dizzy and fell down. His friends quickly rushed to his aid. Bob was dehydrated from exerting himself.
target: Bob's friends quickly brought him some water to hydrate him.

source: Kathy realized to her horror that she was out of milk. So she gathered her young children up and went to the store. They were bad in the store and screamed a lot. Kathy cried on the way home.
target: The children all went to bed without any dinner.

source: Chuck always wanted to join the debate team at school. He has great ideas to debate with but he is scared of public speaking. He took a speech class over the summer to help. As soon as the school year started he signed up for the team.
target: Chuck joined and did fairly well.

source: I once got lost in the woods. It was very hot. I soon got really thirsty. I felt like I was going to die.
target: Luckily my friends found me.

source: Laura had a passion for art. She would paint everyday after class. She painted a self portrait of herself one day. She posted it online for everyone to see.
target: Laura was pleased to show people her art.

source: Jason had always admired the fast movements of boxers he saw on TV. He started training to become a boxer in his spare time. He practiced jabs and jumped rope for hours each day. Finally he was a great boxer.
target: He won his first fight by knockout.

source: Our kids had a 2 day break from school. So we decided to take a fun trip to Great Wolf Lodge. The kids enjoyed swimming at the water park. We enjoyed pizza and story time after swimming.
target: We all had a good time.

source: Tom was at the bus stop on a weekend. Next to him was a tall gentleman. He started yelling all of a sudden. Tom and everyone else around him got a bit uncomfortable.
target: Tom asked him what the problem was.

source: Allie lost 50 pounds. The doctor told her she needed to lose 10 more. If she lost 10 more he would do skin removal. Allie dieted hard and exercised.
target: Allie was able to lose the 10 pounds and have the skin removal.
